Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by [0] seconds ( [0]% ). Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

R.name: Death Lotus
R.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly throwing knives at the three nearest enemy champions, dealing 25/37.5/50 (+0.22*Bonus AD) (+0.19*Bonus AP) magic damage per knife. Total over 2.5 seconds to each enemy: 3*Bonus AD (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage. Applies Grievous Wounds to all enemies struck, reducing their healing and regeneration by 40%.

P.name: Holy Fervor
P.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Q.name: Reckoning
Q.description: Blasts an enemy, dealing 60/110/160/210/260 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by 35/40/45/50/55% for 3 seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

W.name: Divine Blessing
W.description: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by 18/21/24/27/30% (+0.07*Bonus AP%) for 3 seconds and healing them for 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.45*Bonus AP) Health.

E.name: Righteous Fury
E.description: Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional 10/15/20/25/30 (+0.15*Bonus AP) magic damage on hit. Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit. In addition, deals 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35/0.4*Bonus AD) (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and applies spell effects on attack to enemies near her target.

R.name: Intervention
R.description: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for 2/2.5/3 seconds.

P.name: The Darkin Scythe
P.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

Q.name: Reaping Slash
Q.description: Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65*Bonus AD) physical damage. Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead. Deals 55 bonus physical damage to monsters.

W.name: Blade's Reach
W.description: Kayn deals 90/135/180/225/270 (+1.3*Bonus AD) physical damage and slows enemies hit by 60%, decaying over the next 1.5 seconds. Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach. Darkin: Gain a knock up.

E.name: Shadow Step
E.description: Kayn gains 40% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for 7/7.5/8/8.5/9 seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for 100/115/130/145/160 (+0.4*Bonus AD) . Shadow Assassin: Gain more movement speed and slow immunity. Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects and spending more than 1.5 consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.

R.name: Umbral Trespass
R.description: Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged , becoming untargetable for up to 2.5 seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes 150/250/350 (+1.75*Bonus AD) physical damage. Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range and refresh The Darkin Scythe on exit. Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.

P.name: Mark of the Storm
P.description: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.   The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

Q.name: Thundering Shuriken
Q.description: Throws a shuriken that deals 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

W.name: Electrical Surge
W.description: Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to 10/20/30/40/50 (+ [0]) (+0.2*Bonus AP) and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target. Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage.

E.name: Lightning Rush
E.description: Kennen turns into a ball of lightning for up to [0] seconds, dealing [0] (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies he passes through. While a ball of lightning, Kennen gains [0] armor and magic resist, and [0]% movement speed. Kennen is refunded [0] energy if he damages at least one enemy in this form. Upon returning to his normal form, Kennen gains [0]% attack speed for [0] seconds. Lightning Rush deals [0]% damage to minions. Kennen ignores unit collision while he is a ball of lightning.

R.name: Slicing Maelstrom
R.description: Summons a magical storm for 3 seconds that deals 40/75/110 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every 0.5 seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3. Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional 10% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

P.name: Unseen Threat
P.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

Q.name: Taste Their Fear
Q.description: Deals 50/75/100/125/150 (+1.3*Bonus AD) physical damage. If the target is Isolated , the damage is increased by 100% ( [0] ). Evolved Reaper Claws: Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by 50. If target is Isolated , refunds 45% of Taste Their Fear's cooldown.

W.name: Void Spike
W.description: Fires exploding spikes, dealing 85/115/145/175/205 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies hit. Heals Kha'Zix for 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.5*Bonus AP) if he is within the explosion radius. Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by 60% for 2 seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for 90% instead.

E.name: Leap
E.description: Leaps to target area, dealing 65/100/135/170/205 (+0.2*Bonus AD) physical damage. Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

R.name: Void Assault
R.description: Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities. Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for 1.25 seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible , he gains 40% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be used again within 10 seconds of the initial use, up to 2 times total. Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: Void Assault's uses are increased to 3 within 10 seconds, and its stealth duration is increased to 2 seconds. Stealth - Invisible : Kha'Zix can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight .

P.name: Mark of the Kindred
P.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

Q.name: Dance of Arrows
Q.description: Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65*Bonus AD) physical damage and gains [0]% bonus attack speed for 4 seconds. Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to 4/3.5/3/2.5/2 seconds.

W.name: Wolf's Frenzy
W.description: Passive: As Kindred move and attack they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack restores up to [0] health based on how much health Kindred is missing. Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for 8.5 seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her. Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to 25/30/35/40/45 (+0.2*Bonus AD) plus [0]% of the target's current health. Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for 50% increased damage and reduce their Movement Speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

E.name: Mounting Dread
E.description: Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by 50% for 1 second. After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing 80/100/120/140/160 (+0.8*Bonus AD) plus [0]% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage. Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for 50% increased damage if they are below 15% (+ [0]%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance ). [Maximum vs. monsters]

R.name: Lamb's Respite
R.description: Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for 4 seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy , can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing. When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for 200/250/300.

P.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
P.description: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.  While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

Q.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
Q.description: Kled throws a bear trap that deals 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight . Deals 150% damage to minions passed through. If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for 1.75 seconds, he deals 60/110/160/210/260 (+ [0]) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by 40/45/50/55/60% for 1.5 seconds. Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage .

W.name: Violent Tendencies
W.description: Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining 150% attack speed for four attacks or 4 seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown. The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to 20/30/40/50/60 plus 4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5% (+ [0]%) of the target's maximum health (maximum 200 vs monsters).

E.name: Jousting
E.description: Kled dashes, dealing 35/60/85/110/135 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls. If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains 50% movement speed for 1 second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within 3 seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

R.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
R.description: Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of 200/300/400 (+3*Bonus AD) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends. Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to [0]% (+ [0]%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

P.name: Icathian Surprise
P.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

Q.name: Caustic Spittle
Q.description: Passive: Kog'Maw gains 15/20/25/30/35% bonus attack speed. Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by 20/22/24/26/28% for 4 seconds.

W.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
W.description: For 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain 130/150/170/190/210 range and deal 3/3.75/4.5/5.25/6% (+ [0])% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

E.name: Void Ooze
E.description: Deals 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for 4 seconds, slowing enemies in it by 20/28/36/44/52%.

R.name: Living Artillery
R.description: Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for 100/140/180 (+0.65*Bonus AD) (+0.25*Bonus AP) to [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage based on their missing health. If enemies are below 40% health, they take [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage instead. Each subsequent shot within 8 seconds costs 40 more Mana (max 400).

P.name: Mirror Image
P.description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.  Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.   Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.

Q.name: Sigil of Malice
Q.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage.

W.name: Distortion
W.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

E.name: Ethereal Chains
E.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and granting True Sight of the target. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them for 1.5 seconds and deals an additional 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage.

R.name: Mimic
R.description: LeBlanc mimics her most recent spell, casting it again. Mimicked Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains deal [0] (+ [0]) magic damage, plus [0] (+ [0]) magic damage from their mark and root, respectively. Mimicked Distortion deals [0] (+ [0]) magic damage.

P.name: Flurry
P.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

Q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
Q.description: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds. Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+1*Bonus AD) to 100/150/200/250/300 (+2*Bonus AD) physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

W.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
W.description: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for 55/110/165/220/275 (+0.8*Bonus AP) damage for 2 seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by 50%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds. Iron Will: Lee Sin gains 10/15/20/25/30% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for 4 seconds.

E.name: Tempest / Cripple
E.description: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+1*Bonus AD) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds. Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for 4 seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by 20/30/40/50/60%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

R.name: Dragon's Rage
R.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing 150/375/600 (+2*Bonus AD) physical damage. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to 150/375/600 (+2*Bonus AD) plus 12/15/18% of the initial target's bonus health.

P.name: Sunlight
P.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

Q.name: Shield of Daybreak
Q.description: Next basic attack deals 10/35/60/85/110 (+0.3*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage and stuns for 1 second.

W.name: Eclipse
W.description: Grants 25/35/45/55/65 (+0.2*Bonus AD) bonus Armor and 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.2*Bonus AD) Magic Resist for 3 seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.

E.name: Zenith Blade
E.description: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for 0.5 seconds and Leona will dash to them.

R.name: Solar Flare
R.description: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing 100/175/250 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing enemies by 80% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed. Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence , causing her next 3/4/5 basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal 30/40/50 (+0.15*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage on hit.

P.name: Iceborn
P.description: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).

Q.name: Ice Shard
Q.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by 16/19/22/25/28% for 1.5 seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

W.name: Ring of Frost
W.description: Deals 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.

E.name: Glacial Path
E.description: Casts an ice claw that deals 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

R.name: Frozen Tomb
R.description: On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for 1.5 seconds. On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for 2.5 seconds, healing for 100/150/200 (+0.3*Bonus AP) , increased by 1% for each 1% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing 150/250/350 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for 3 seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by 30/45/75%.

P.name: Lightslinger
P.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

Q.name: Piercing Light
Q.description: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for 85/120/155/190/225 (+0.6/0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2*Bonus AD) (60/75/90/105/120% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

W.name: Ardent Blaze
W.description: Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals 85/125/165/205/245 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds. When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains 60/65/70/75/80 Movement Speed for 1 second.

E.name: Relentless Pursuit
E.description: Quickly dashes a short distance. Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by 1 second (doubles to 2 seconds against champions).

R.name: The Culling
R.description: Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for 3 seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do 20/35/50 (+0.1*Bonus AP) (+0.25*Bonus AD) physical damage. The Culling does 200% damage to minions. Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling. Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

P.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
P.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

Q.name: Glitterlance
Q.description: Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit and [0] (+ [0]) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by 80%, decaying over the next 2 second(s). An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of [0] damage per cast.

W.name: Whimsy
W.description: On Ally Cast: Target ally gains 30 (+0.05*Bonus AP) % Movement Speed and 25/30/35/40/45% Attack Speed for 3/3.25/3.5/3.75/4 seconds. On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by 60.

E.name: Help, Pix!
E.description: On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for 6 seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.6*Bonus AP) damage for 2.5 seconds. On Enemy Cast: Pix deals 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for 4 seconds.

R.name: Wild Growth
R.description: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For 7 seconds, her ally gains 300/450/600 (+0.5*Bonus AP) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by 30/45/60%.

P.name: Illumination
P.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

Q.name: Light Binding
Q.description: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for 2 seconds and dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to each.

W.name: Prismatic Barrier
W.description: Throws Lux's wand in target direction protecting her and all allied Champions it touches from 50/65/80/95/110 (+0.2*Bonus AP) damage for 3 seconds. Upon reaching its destination it returns to Lux, protecting her and other allied Champions it touches from another 50/65/80/95/110 (+0.2*Bonus AP) damage for 3 seconds. Shielding an ally with the outgoing shield doubles the value of the returning shield.

E.name: Lucent Singularity
E.description: Creates a zone that slows enemies by 25/30/35/40/45%. After 5 seconds the zone detonates dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. Activate again to detonate early.

R.name: Final Spark
R.description: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing 300/400/500 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy champions that die within 1.75 seconds of being hit by Final Spark refund 30/40/50% of its cooldown. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

P.name: Granite Shield
P.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

Q.name: Seismic Shard
Q.description: Deals 70/120/170/220/270 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage and steals 14/17/20/23/26% Movement Speed from the target for 4 seconds.

W.name: Brutal Strikes
W.description: Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by 10/15/20/25/30% ( [0] ). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to [0]% ( [0] ). Active: Basic attacks deal an additional 15/30/45/60/75 (+ [0]) (+0.1*Bonus AP) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts 6 seconds.

E.name: Ground Slam
E.description: Malphite slams the ground dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.3*Bonus AD) (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by 30/35/40/45/50% for 3 seconds. This ability gains damage equal to 40% of Malphite's Armor.

R.name: Unstoppable Force
R.description: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals 200/300/400 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for 1.5 seconds.

P.name: Void Shift
P.description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.  Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

Q.name: Call of the Void
Q.description: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.65*Bonus AP) magic damage and silencing enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s).

W.name: Void Swarm
W.description: Passive: Casting Malzahar's other spells gives him Gathering Swarm, increasing the number of Voidlings summoned by Void Swarm (max 2). Active: Summons one or more Voidlings. Voidlings last 8/8/9/9/10 seconds and deal an additional 12/14/16/18/20 (+0.2*Bonus AP) (+0.4*Bonus AD) magic damage each hit. Voidlings deal 300% damage to lane minions affected by Malefic Visions. Voidlings deal 50% damage to epic monsters.

E.name: Malefic Visions
E.description: Deal 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage to an enemy target over 4 seconds. Applying Call of the Void or Nether Grasp to the victim during this time refreshes the visions. If the victim is killed, Malzahar gains [0] Mana (2% of max mana) and the visions spread to the nearest enemy.

R.name: Nether Grasp
R.description: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for 2.5 seconds, dealing 125/200/275 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage over the duration. A zone of negative energy is created around his target for 5 seconds, dealing 2/3/4% (+0.005*Bonus AP%) of nearby enemies max health as magic damage per second.

P.name: Sap Magic
P.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

Q.name: Bramble Smash
Q.description: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take 65/105/145/185/225 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and are slowed briefly.

W.name: Twisted Advance
W.description: Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he deals 50/75/100/125/150 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and roots the target for 1/1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4 second(s).

E.name: Sapling Toss
E.description: Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for [0] seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing 25/50/75/100/125 +7/7.25/7.5/7.75/8% [+0.01*Bonus AP%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by 35% for 2 seconds. Saplings placed in brush last for [0] seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over 2 seconds to all enemies hit. Maximum 300 Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

R.name: Nature's Grasp
R.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing 150/225/300 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for (2.4 to 2.4) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.

P.name: Double Strike
P.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

Q.name: Alpha Strike
Q.description: Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing 25/60/95/130/165 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional 0.6*Bonus AD physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second. Deals 75/100/125/150/175 bonus damage to monsters.

W.name: Meditate
W.description: Master Yi channels, reducing incoming damage by 60/62.5/65/67.5/70% and restoring 120/200/280/360/440 (+1*Bonus AP) health over [0] seconds. This healing is increased by up to % based on Master Yi's missing health. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels. Meditate's damage reduction is halved against structures.

E.name: Wuju Style
E.description: Passive: Grants 10% ( [0]) Attack Damage. Active: Basic attacks deal 18/26/34/42/50 (+0.1/0.125/0.15/0.175/0.2*Bonus AD) bonus true damage for 5 seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

R.name: Highlander
R.description: Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%. Active: Increases Movement Speed by 25/35/45%, Attack Speed by 30/55/80%, and grants immunity to slows for 7 seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by 7 seconds.

P.name: Love Tap
P.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

Q.name: Double Up
Q.description: Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing 20/40/60/80/100 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.35*Bonus AP) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects. The second shot can critically strike for [0]% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

W.name: Strut
W.description: Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains 25 Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to 60/70/80/90/100. Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants 40/55/70/85/100% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by [0] seconds.

E.name: Make It Rain
E.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by 28/36/44/52/60%.

R.name: Bullet Time
R.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for 3 seconds, dealing (+0.35*Bonus AD) (+0.2*Bonus AP) physical damage per wave (12/14/16 waves total). Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for [0]% damage. Total Damage: [0]

P.name: Stone Skin
P.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

Q.name: Crushing Blow
Q.description: Wukong's next attack gains 125 range, deals 10/40/70/100/130 (+1.1*Bonus AD) bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by 10/15/20/25/30% for 3 seconds.

W.name: Decoy
W.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for 1.5 seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.6*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds. Stealth - Invisible : Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight .

E.name: Nimbus Strike
E.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes 65/100/135/170/205 (+0.8*Bonus AD) physical damage. Wukong then gains 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

R.name: Cyclone
R.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing 20/110/200 (+1.1*Bonus AD) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for 1 second the first time they get hit. At the start, Wukong gains 15% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional 10% per second over the duration.

P.name: Iron Man
P.description: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.

Q.name: Mace of Spades
Q.description: Mordekaiser's next three hits are empowered. The first two strikes deal 10/20/30/40/50 (+1.65*Bonus AD) (+1*Bonus AD) bonus magic damage. The final strike deals 2 times the bonus damage of the previous strikes, up to [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) .

W.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
W.description: Passive: Mordekaiser gains bonus experience for killing minions near allied champions. Bonus Experience Earned: [0] Active: Target an ally, linking them to Mordekaiser: Both gain up to 75 movement speed toward one another. When they touch, they deal 140/180/220/260/300 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies. Reactivate to both instantly steal 50/85/120/155/190 (+0.3*Bonus AP) health from nearby enemies (25% heal on minions, max 2 units; deals magic damage).

E.name: Siphon of Destruction
E.description: Mordekaiser deals 35/65/95/125/155 (+0.6*Bonus AD) (+0.6*Bonus AD) magic damage in a cone. For each Champion hit, he gains 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% maximum shield.

R.name: Children of the Grave
R.description: Passive - Dragon Force: Damaging the Dragon will Curse it for 10 seconds. Active: Curse target Champion and steal 25/30/35% (+0.04*Bonus AP%) of their maximum health (25% initially, 75% over 10 seconds; deals magic damage). Curse Effect: When killed by Mordekaiser's team, the Cursed unit's soul will follow Mordekaiser for 45/60/75 seconds. Mordekaiser gains 30% of their ability power and 25% of their bonus health. The ghost gains (+ [0]) attack damage and (+ [0]) health. The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

P.name: Soul Siphon
P.description: Morgana heals for the spell damage she deals to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

Q.name: Dark Binding
Q.description: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3 seconds and dealing 80/135/190/245/300 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage.

W.name: Tormented Soil
W.description: Curses an area for 5 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt from 16/32/48/64/80 (+0.22*Bonus AP) to 24/48/72/96/120 (+0.33*Bonus AP) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health. Every time Soul Siphon heals Morgana, Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by 5%.

E.name: Black Shield
E.description: Shields an allied Champion for 5 seconds. The shield absorbs 70/140/210/280/350 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

R.name: Soul Shackles
R.description: Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing 150/225/300 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing them by 20% for 3 seconds, granting True Sight . After 3 seconds, they are dealt an additional 150/225/300 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

P.name: Surging Tides
P.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

Q.name: Aqua Prison
Q.description: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing 75/130/185/240/295 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Ebb and Flow
W.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions. On Ally Hit: Heals 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.3*Bonus AP) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion. On Enemy Hit: Deals 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion. Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to 3 targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ( [0]%) each bounce.

E.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
E.description: Empowers an allied champion's next 3 basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by 15/20/25/30/35% (+0.05*Bonus AP%) for 1 second and deal 25/40/55/70/85 (+0.2*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage. Lasts for 6 seconds.

R.name: Tidal Wave
R.description: Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by 50/60/70%, dealing 150/250/350 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of 4 seconds. Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

P.name: Soul Eater
P.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

Q.name: Siphoning Strike
Q.description: Nasus's next basic attack will deal 30/50/70/90/110 (+1*Bonus AD) (+3*Bonus AD) physical damage. Siphoning Strike permanently gains 3 damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

W.name: Wither
W.description: Nasus ages target champion over 5 seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by 35%, increasing to 47/59/71/83/95% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

E.name: Spirit Fire
E.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at target location, dealing 55/95/135/175/215 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. For the next 5 seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by 15/20/25/30/35% and are dealt an additional 11/19/27/35/43 (+0.12*Bonus AP) magic damage each second.

R.name: Fury of the Sands
R.description: Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by 300/450/600 and Armor and Magic Resistance by 15/35/55. While the storm rages, he deals 3/4/5 (+0.01*Bonus AP) % of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage (240 damage max per second), gains an additional 1/2/3 Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a 50% reduced cooldown.

P.name: Staggering Blow
P.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

Q.name: Dredge Line
Q.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage and stunning them briefly. If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by 50% ( 0.5*Bonus AD ), and 50% of the Mana cost is refunded.

W.name: Titan's Wrath
W.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for 6 seconds, shielding him from the next 60/70/80/90/100 (+0.1*Bonus AD) (9/10/11/12/13% of his max Health) damage. While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal 30/40/50/60/70 (+0.4*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all enemies around his target.

E.name: Riptide
E.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by 30/35/40/45/50% for 1.25 seconds. This slow diminishes over time. A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take 50% less damage from additional explosions.

R.name: Depth Charge
R.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing 125/175/225 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for 1/1.5/2 seconds. The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing 200/325/450 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for 1/1.5/2 seconds.

P.name: Prowl
P.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.  Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt , granting True Sight  of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted  target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

Q.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
Q.description: Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing 70/85/100/115/130 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential 210/255/300/345/390 (+1.2*Bonus AP) total damage. Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

W.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
W.description: Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for 40/80/120/160/200 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage over 4 seconds. [0] traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16) Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

E.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
E.description: Human: Nidalee heals target ally champion for 35/55/75/95/115 (+0.325*Bonus AP) to 70/110/150/190/230 (+ [0]) based on their missing health and grants them 20/30/40/50/60% Attack Speed for 7 seconds. Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in target direction.

R.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
R.description: Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe. Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

P.name: Umbra Blades
P.description: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.  Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second (2 against champions).

Q.name: Duskbringer
Q.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals 65/110/155/200/245 (+0.75*Bonus AD) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for 5 seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains 15/20/25/30/35% Movement Speed and 20/30/40/50/60 Attack Damage.

W.name: Shroud of Darkness
W.description: Passive: Nocturne gains 20/25/30/35/40% Attack Speed. Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability. If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds. Shroud of Darkness will remain active during Paranoia's flight.

E.name: Unspeakable Horror
E.description: Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward feared enemies. Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage over 2 seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes feared for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 second(s).

R.name: Paranoia
R.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 6 seconds. While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing 150/275/400 (+1.2*Bonus AD) physical damage.

P.name: Call of the Freljord
P.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally.

Q.name: Consume
Q.description: Willump takes a bite of an enemy, dealing damage and healing himself. This healing increases by [0]% when he is below [0]% health. Monsters and minions : Deals [0] true damage and heals for [0]. Champions : Deals [0] magic damage and heals for [0].

W.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
W.description: Willump rolls a snowball that grows in size and speed. When it collides with an enemy champion, large monster, or wall, it explodes, dealing up to [0] magic damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up for up to [0]s. Reactivating the ability releases the snowball and rolls it forward on a straight path. Holding a turn causes Willump to turn faster in that direction.

E.name: Snowball Barrage
E.description: Nunu throws 3 snowballs. Snowball Barrage can be cast two additional times to throw even more snowballs. Enemies hit take [0] magic damage per snowball. Enemies hit by 3 consecutive snowballs are slowed by [0]% for [0]s. Champions and large monsters become Snowbound . Willump's Turn : After [0] seconds, all enemies within range that are Snowbound take [0] magic damage and become rooted for [0] s.

R.name: Absolute Zero
R.description: Willump channels for [0] seconds, creating a powerful blizzard. Enemies in the blizzard are slowed by [0]%, increasing to [0]% over the duration. Nunu & Willump receive a shield that absorbs [0] damage that decays over [0] seconds after the blizzard ends. When the blizzard ends, enemies in the area take up to [0] magic damage , based on the blizzard's duration.

P.name: Berserker Rage
P.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

Q.name: Undertow
Q.description: Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by 29/33/37/41/45% for up to 2.5 seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than 1.5 seconds. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

W.name: Vicious Strikes
W.description: For 6 seconds, Olaf gains 14/16/18/20/22% Life Steal and his Attack Speed is increased by 55/65/75/85/95%. During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every 2% of Health he is missing.

E.name: Reckless Swing
E.description: Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.5*Bonus AD) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to 30% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

R.name: Ragnarok
R.description: Passive: Olaf gains 20/30/40 Armor and 20/30/40 Magic Resist. Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next 6 seconds. Olaf also receives a 20/45/70% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for 1 second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains [0] Attack Damage (15/20/25 + 30% of his Total Attack Damage).

P.name: Clockwork Windup
P.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

Q.name: Command: Attack
Q.description: Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals 10% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum 40%). Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

W.name: Command: Dissonance
W.description: Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies. The pulse leaves behind an energy field for 3 seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by 20/25/30/35/40% and increasing ally Movement Speed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 2 seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

E.name: Command: Protect
E.description: Passive: The Ball adds 10/15/20/25/30 Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to. Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for 2.5 seconds from the next 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage.

R.name: Command: Shockwave
R.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing 150/225/300 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the Ball.

P.name: Living Forge
P.description: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.  Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase.   Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

Q.name: Volcanic Rupture
Q.description: Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and slows by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for 4 seconds. The fissure stops shortly after hitting an enemy champion.

W.name: Bellows Breath
W.description: Ornn stomps forwards, breathing fire and shielding himself for [0] (12% max health) for 3.5 seconds. The fire deals up to % of the enemy's max health as magic damage (minimum 80/130/180/230/280). Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for [0] seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals [0] % of their max health as magic damage. Ornn's basic attacks knock back Brittle targets.

E.name: Searing Charge
E.description: Ornn charges, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) physical damage to enemies hit. If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that knocks up enemies for 1 second and applies Searing Charge's damage to those not hit by the charge. The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

R.name: Call of the Forge God
R.description: Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take 125/175/225 (+ [0]) magic damage, are slowed by 40/60/80% for 2 seconds and become Brittle for [0] seconds. Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds, deals 125/175/225 (+ [0]) magic damage and applies Brittle .

P.name: Aegis Protection
P.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.

Q.name: Spear Shot
Q.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing 75/110/155/195/235 (+1.4*Bonus AD) physical damage.

W.name: Aegis of Zeonia
W.description: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage and stunning them for 1 second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

E.name: Heartseeker Strike
E.description: Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below 15% Health. Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers 3 swift strikes in front of him for a total of 100/150/200/250/300 (+3*Bonus AD) physical damage (deals 60% damage to minions and monsters). Damage per Strike: 0.6*Bonus AD

R.name: Grand Skyfall
R.description: Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to 400/700/1000 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to 50% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by 35% for 1 second. If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a 30 second cooldown.

P.name: Iron Ambassador
P.description: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.  The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

Q.name: Hammer Shock
Q.description: Poppy smashes the ground, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.9*Bonus AD) plus 8% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area. The area slows enemies inside it by 20/25/30/35/40% and erupts after 1 second, dealing the initial damage again.

W.name: Steadfast Presence
W.description: Passive: Poppy gains [0] Armor and [0] Magic Resist (10% of Armor and Magic Resist). This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below 40% Health. Active: For the next 2.5 seconds, Poppy gains 30% Movement Speed. While Steadfast Presence is active, she stops enemy dashes in an area around her, dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage.

E.name: Heroic Charge
E.description: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.5*Bonus AD) additional physical damage and is stunned for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds.

R.name: Keeper's Verdict
R.description: First Cast: Poppy channels for up to 4 seconds, slowing herself by 15%. Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals 200/300/400 (+0.9*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration. An uncharged Keeper's Verdict deals half damage and knocks enemies up for 0.75 seconds. Enemies hit with a charged Keeper's Verdict are untargetable.

P.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
P.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

Q.name: Bone Skewer
Q.description: Tap: Pyke stabs all enemies in front of him dealing [0] (+ [0]) physical damage. Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, pulling the first enemy struck towards him and dealing 75/125/175/225/275 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage. Targets hit by either attack are slowed by 90% for 1 second. Tapping deals 50% reduced damage to minions and monsters beyond the closest.

W.name: Ghostwater Dive
W.description: Pyke gains Camouflage and 40% (+ [0]%) decaying movement speed for seconds. Stealth - Camouflage: Pyke is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

E.name: Phantom Undertow
E.description: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him. After a short delay the phantom returns to Pyke, striking all enemies along its path dealing 95/125/155/185/215 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage and stunning for [0] seconds.

R.name: Death From Below
R.description: Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, blinking to and executing targets below [0] (+0.8*Bonus AD) (+ [0]) health. Enemies not executed instead take physical damage equal to the threshold. When an enemy champion dies in the X from any source, an assisting ally also gains full kill gold and Pyke may re-cast Death From Below again within 20 seconds. Total gold granted: [0]

P.name: Harrier
P.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable . Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable  targets will deal bonus physical damage.

Q.name: Blinding Assault
Q.description: Valor flies in a line, marking the first enemy he hits as Vulnerable and reducing its vision radius dramatically for 1.5 seconds. He then deals 20/45/70/95/120 (+ [0]) (+0.5*Bonus AP) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If the primary target is not a champion, it cannot attack for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Heightened Senses
W.description: Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by 20/35/50/65/80% and Movement Speed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 2 seconds. Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for 2 seconds.

E.name: Vault
E.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.2*Bonus AD) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable . Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by 50% (diminishing over 1.5 seconds).

R.name: Behind Enemy Lines
R.description: Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining 70/100/130% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by recasting this ability or taking offensive action. Skystrike : Quinn and Valor deal [0] physical damage to nearby enemies and mark champions with Vulnerable . Casting Skystrike ends Behind Enemy Lines. Being damaged by non-minions removes the movement speed bonus for 3 seconds.

P.name: Fey Feathers
P.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

Q.name: Gleaming Quill
Q.description: Flings a magical feather that deals 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit. If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores [0] (+0.7*Bonus AP) health to himself and nearby allies after 3 seconds or when he touches an ally.

W.name: Grand Entrance
W.description: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and knocking up enemies for 1 second.

E.name: Battle Dance
E.description: Flies to an allied champion, granting them a 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.8*Bonus AP) health shield for 3 seconds. Can be re-cast at no cost once within 5 seconds. Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

R.name: The Quickness
R.description: Gain 50% movement speed for 4 seconds. Touching enemies deals 100/200/300 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage and charms them for 1/1.25/1.5 second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan 150% decaying movement speed.

P.name: Spiked Shell
P.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

Q.name: Powerball
Q.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to [0]% Movement Speed over 6 seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by 40/50/60/70/80% for 1 second. Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown. Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting. Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

W.name: Defensive Ball Curl
W.description: Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to 6 seconds, increasing Armor by 30 plus 60/70/80/90/100% (0.1*Bonus AD) and Magic Resist by 10 plus 30/35/40/45/50% ( [0]) but becoming slowed by 30%. During this time, Spiked Shell deals 150% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus. Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown. Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

E.name: Frenzying Taunt
E.description: Taunt an enemy champion or monster for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 seconds and gain 20/25/30/35/40% Attack Speed for the same duration. While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

R.name: Tremors
R.description: Shake the earth for 7 seconds, dealing 40/80/120 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 8/10/12% for 1.5 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. Tremors deals 200% damage to turrets.

P.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
P.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

Q.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
Q.description: Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal 20/25/30/35/40 (+0.5*Bonus AD) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.7*Bonus AP) (+0.5*Bonus AD) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for 2.5 seconds.

W.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
W.description: Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground. Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing 55/70/85/100/115 (+0.8*Bonus AD) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for 1 second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for 10 seconds. Burrowed Effects: New abilities, + [0] Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

E.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
E.description: Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing 55/65/75/85/95 (+0.85*Bonus AD) Physical Damage. At max Fury, the bite does 100% more and deals True Damage. Maximum Damage: [0] Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances . Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance. Tunnel Entrances last for 10 minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have 8 tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a 10/8/6/4/2 second cooldown on use.

R.name: Void Rush
R.description: Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next 5 seconds. Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing 100/250/400 (+2*Bonus AD) physical damage plus 20/25/30% of their missing Health.

P.name: Reign of Anger
P.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

Q.name: Cull the Meek
Q.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing 65/100/135/170/205 (+0.8*Bonus AD) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for 3/4.5/6/7.5/9 (+0.8*Bonus AD) Health for each non-champion hit and 1.2*Bonus AD (+ [0]) Health for each champion hit, up to 50/75/100/125/150 Health. He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury . 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to 100/150/200/250/300 (+1.2*Bonus AD) . Heal increased to 9/13.5/18/22.5/27 (+ [0]) per non-champion and [0] (+ [0]) per champion, up to 150/225/300/375/450. No longer generates Fury .

W.name: Ruthless Predator
W.description: Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for 0.75 seconds and dealing 5/15/25/35/45 (+1.5*Bonus AD) physical damage per hit (10/30/50/70/90 (+2.25*Bonus AD) total). Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury . Hitting a champion generates an additional 10 Fury . 50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for 1.5 seconds and dealing a total of 15/45/75/105/135 (+ [0]) damage. No longer generates Fury .

E.name: Slice and Dice
E.description: Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.9*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds. Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.9*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies he passes through. He generates 2 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of Fury . Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to 70/115/160/205/250 (+1.35*Bonus AD) . Enemies hit have 25/27.5/30/32.5/35% reduced Armor for 4 seconds. No longer generates Fury .

R.name: Dominus
R.description: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining 250/500/750 Health and 20 Fury . While active, he deals 40/80/120 (+0.1*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

P.name: Unseen Predator
P.description: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.   Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.  Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

Q.name: Savagery
Q.description: Rengar gains 40% Attack Speed for his next 2 attacks. The first attack deals 30/60/90/120/150 (+ [0]) physical damage. Ferocity effect: Savagery's damage is increased to [0] (+1.4*Bonus AD) and grants Rengar [0] % Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

W.name: Battle Roar
W.description: Deals 50/80/110/140/170 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for 50% of the damage he took in the last 1.5 seconds. Ferocity effect: Deals [0] (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect. Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by 50%.

E.name: Bola Strike
E.description: Throw a bola, dealing 55/100/145/190/235 (+0.8*Bonus AD) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by 30/45/60/75/90% for 1.75 seconds. Ferocity effect: Deals [0] (+0.8*Bonus AD) physical damage and roots the target for 1.75 seconds.

R.name: Thrill of the Hunt
R.description: Rengar gains 40/50/60% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion within 2500/3000/3500 range for 12/16/20 seconds. After the first 2 seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals 0.5*Bonus AD bonus physical damage and reduces their Armor by 12/18/24 for 4 seconds. Enemy champions within 1600 range and their nearby allies can sense Rengar during Thrill of the Hunt. Enemies revealed by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed while they remain in tracking range. Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt. Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.

P.name: Runic Blade
P.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

Q.name: Broken Wings
Q.description: Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be re-cast 2 additional times. 1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing 15/35/55/75/95 (+0.4/0.45/0.5/0.55/0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with. 3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing 15/35/55/75/95 (+0.4/0.45/0.5/0.55/0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain. Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

W.name: Ki Burst
W.description: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing 55/85/115/145/175 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

E.name: Valor
E.description: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to 95/125/155/185/215 (+1*Bonus AD) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Blade of the Exile
R.description: Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for 15 seconds, granting her 20% extra Attack Damage ( +0.2*Bonus AD ), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once. Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from 100/150/200 (+0.6*Bonus AD) to 300/450/600 (+1.8*Bonus AD) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

P.name: Junkyard Titan
P.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

Q.name: Flamespitter
Q.description: Rumble torches his opponents, dealing 175/210/245/280/315 (+1.1*Bonus AP) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals 60/65/70/75/80% damage to minions. Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 150% damage.

W.name: Scrap Shield
W.description: Rumble tosses up a shield for 1.5 seconds that absorbs 100/130/160/190/220 (+0.5*Bonus AP) damage. Rumble also gains an additional 10/15/20/25/30% Movement Speed for 1 second. Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

E.name: Electro Harpoon
E.description: Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of 15/20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds. Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

R.name: The Equalizer
R.description: Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by 35% and take 140/210/280 (+0.35*Bonus AP) magic damage each second. You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

P.name: Arcane Mastery
P.description: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

Q.name: Overload
Q.description: Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune for 4 seconds, up to 2 Runes . Active: Unleash a runic blast, dealing 60/85/110/135/160/185 (+0.45*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage to the first enemy struck. Any active Runes are discharged. If 2 Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from [0] (+0.6*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by 25/28/31/34/37/40% for 2 seconds.

W.name: Rune Prison
W.description: Instantly root an enemy for 0.75 second and deal 80/100/120/140/160 (+0.6*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage.

E.name: Spell Flux
E.description: Apply Flux to an enemy, dealing 70/90/110/130/150 (+0.3*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage. Spells consume Flux for bonus effects: Overload: Deals 40/50/60/70/80% more damage and spreads to nearby enemies with Flux. Rune Prison: Root duration is increased to 1.5 seconds. Spell Flux: Spreads Spell Flux to nearby enemies, dealing 50% damage. Spells that kill enemies affected by Flux spread Spell Flux to nearby enemies.

R.name: Realm Warp
R.description: Ryze opens a portal to a location up to 1750/3000 range away. After 2 seconds, all allies near the portal are teleported to that location. If Ryze becomes unable to cast or move, Realm Warp is cancelled.

P.name: Fury of the North
P.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

Q.name: Arctic Assault
Q.description: Sejuani charges, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

W.name: Winter's Wrath
W.description: Sejuani swings her flail, dealing 20/25/30/35/40 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back. She then lashes out with her flail, dealing 30/65/100/135/170 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

E.name: Permafrost
E.description: Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, large monsters, medium monsters, and large minions. Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes 20/35/50/65/80 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage, is stunned for 1/1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4 second(s), and is briefly displaced. Enemy champions stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for [0] seconds.

R.name: Glacial Prison
R.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals 100/125/150 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for 1 second. The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing 150/250/350 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage, stunning for 1.5 seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by 30%. After 2 seconds, the storm deals 150/250/350 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and slows by 80% for 1 second.

P.name: Backstab
P.description: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

Q.name: Deceive
Q.description: Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for 1.5/2.25/3/3.75/4.5 seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate. His next basic attack during Invisibility deals 10/20/30/40/50 (+0.4*Bonus AD) (+0.3*Bonus AP) bonus physical damage and reduces Deceive's cooldown by [0] seconds. Stealth - Invisible : Shaco can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight .

W.name: Jack In The Box
W.description: Shaco creates a Jack in the Box that hides from view after 2 seconds. It pops out when an enemy comes near or when uncovered by a ward or trinket, making nearby enemies flee very slowly for 0.5/0.75/1/1.25/1.5 seconds. Its attacks deal 35/50/65/80/95 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage. It lasts for 60 (+0.05*Bonus AP) seconds while hidden or 5 seconds while firing.

E.name: Two-Shiv Poison
E.description: Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's movement speed by 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% for 2 seconds. Active: Shaco throws a shiv that deals 55/80/105/130/155 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.75*Bonus AP) physical damage and reduces the target's movement speed by 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% for 3 seconds. The shiv's damage is increased by up to 50% based on the target's missing health.

R.name: Hallucinate
R.description: Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing 200/300/400 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes. Mini boxes deal 25/50/75 (+0.15*Bonus AP) damage, make enemies flee for 0.75/1/1.25 second(s), and trigger together. Clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives 50% increased damage. The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

P.name: Ki Barrier
P.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

Q.name: Twilight Assault
Q.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by 15/20/25/30/35% when moving away from Shen for the next 2 seconds. Shen's next 3 attacks deal [0] plus 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 (+ [0]) % of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal [0] plus 4/4.5/5/5.5/6 (+ [0]) % instead and have +50% Attack Speed. Each attack deals 100% increased damage to monsters (capped at 75/100/125/150/175).

W.name: Spirit's Refuge
W.description: Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for 1.75 seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked. If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or 2 seconds pass.

E.name: Shadow Dash
E.description: Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers [0] Energy. Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 [+ [0]] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Stand United
R.description: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that lasts 5 seconds and absorbs up to 175/350/525 (+1.35*Bonus AP) to 280/560/840 (+ [0]) damage based on their missing health. After channeling for [0] seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

P.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
P.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

Q.name: Twin Bite
Q.description: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing [0] and 0.8/0.85/0.9/0.95/1*Bonus AD physical damage on the first and second hits respectively. While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana. Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to 20/35/50/65/80% of Shyvana's attack damage.

W.name: Burnout
W.description: Shyvana deals 20/32/45/57/70 (+0.2*Bonus AD) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus 30/35/40/45/50% movement speed that decays over 3 seconds. While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal [0] (+ [0]) magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by 1 second. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size. Burnout has a maximum duration of 7 seconds.

E.name: Flame Breath
E.description: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take 60/100/140/180/220 (+ [0]) (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and are marked for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal 2.5% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage per second. Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at 100 damage per hit.

R.name: Dragon's Descent
R.description: Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon, gaining Health and flying to target location. Enemies along her path take 150/250/350 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location. Passive: Shyvana generates 1/1.5/2 Fury every second. Basic Attacks generate 2 Fury.

P.name: Noxious Slipstream
P.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

Q.name: Poison Trail
Q.description: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals 20/30/40/50/60 (+ [0]) magic damage per second.

W.name: Mega Adhesive
W.description: Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for 3 seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by 40% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

E.name: Fling
E.description: Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing 50/65/80/95/110 (+0.75*Bonus AP) plus 4/5/6/7/8% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s).

R.name: Insanity Potion
R.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him 30/55/80 Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for 25 seconds.

P.name: Glory in Death
P.description: After being killed, Sion will reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, gain 100% Lifesteal and deal bonus damage equal to 10% of his target's maximum Health (max 75 to monsters).  All his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants a burst of Movement Speed.

Q.name: Decimating Smash
Q.description: Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.6*Bonus AD) to 90/150/210/270/330 (+1.8*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies hit (60% damage to minions) and briefly slows them. If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

W.name: Soul Furnace
W.description: Passive: Sion gains 4 maximum Health when he kills a unit (15 for champion kills, assists, large minions and large monsters). Current Bonus: 0.1*Bonus AD Active: Sion shields himself for 30/55/80/105/130 (+0.4*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) (8/9/10/11/12% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After 3 seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.4*Bonus AP) plus 10/11/12/13/14% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Max 400 bonus damage to minions and monsters.

E.name: Roar of the Slayer
E.description: Sion fires a shockwave, dealing 65/100/135/170/205 (+0.55*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit and knocking it back if it is not a champion (significantly increasing its range). Targets hit by the shockwave or the knocked back unit take the same damage and are slowed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2.5 seconds and have their Armor reduced by 20% for 4 seconds.

R.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
R.description: Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early. When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals 150/300/450 (+0.4*Bonus AD) physical damage and knocks up enemies in a small area for 0.75 seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and are slowed by 40/45/50% for 3 seconds. The damage increases to 400/800/1200 (+0.8*Bonus AD) and the stun increases to 1.75 seconds as Sion charges farther.

P.name: Fleet of Foot
P.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

Q.name: Boomerang Blade
Q.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals 35/55/75/95/115 (+0*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AP) physical damage to the first target hit and 15% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of 40%.

W.name: Ricochet
W.description: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing 0*Bonus AD physical damage to the first target and 0*Bonus AD physical damage to each subsequent target. If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike. Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.

E.name: Spell Shield
E.description: Sivir creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability. If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains 80/95/110/125/140 Mana.

R.name: On The Hunt
R.description: Passive: Sivir gains 30/45/60% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active. Active: Sivir rallies her allies for 8 seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial 40/50/60% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to 20% after the first 2/3/4 seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

P.name: Crystal Spires
