P.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

Q.name: Precision Protocol
Q.description: Camille's next basic attack deals [0] bonus physical damage and increases her movement speed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 1 second. This ability can be recast in the next seconds at no cost. If the second Precision Protocol attack hits at least 1.5 seconds after the first, the bonus damage is increased by 100% to [0] and [0]% of the attack is converted into true damage. Precision Protocol cannot critically strike.

W.name: Tactical Sweep
W.description: Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+ [0]) physical damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% ( + [0] %) of their maximum health, and Camille heals for 100% of the bonus damage dealt to champions. Tactical Sweep does 50% less damage to non-epic monsters.

E.name: Hookshot
E.description: First Cast: Fire a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling Camille to it and allowing Hookshot to be recast for 1 second. Second Cast: Camille leaps from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals 60/95/130/165/200 (+ [0]) physical damage and a 0.75 second stun to nearby enemies. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant 40/50/60/70/80% attack speed for 5 seconds on impact.

R.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
R.description: Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for 2.5/3.25/4 seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to 5/10/15 plus 4/6/8% of their current health. The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.

P.name: Serpentine Grace
P.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

Q.name: Noxious Blast
Q.description: Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison . If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains 30/35/40/45/50% Movement Speed decaying over 3 seconds. Noxious Poison deals 75/125/175/225/275 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage over 3 seconds.

W.name: Miasma
W.description: Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for 5 seconds. Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison , inflicting a decaying 40/50/60/70/80% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take 20/35/50/65/80 (+0.15*Bonus AP) magic damage per second. Miasma has a minimum cast range.

E.name: Twin Fang
E.description: Deal 0.55*Bonus AP (+0.1*Bonus AP) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains [0] Mana. If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes 10/30/50/70/90 (+0.6*Bonus AP) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for [0] (+ [0]) .

R.name: Petrifying Gaze
R.description: Cassiopeia deals 150/250/350 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for 2 seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by 40%.

P.name: Carnivore
P.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

Q.name: Rupture
Q.description: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take 80/135/190/245/300 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Feral Scream
W.description: Silences enemies in a cone for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and deals 75/125/175/225/275 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage.

E.name: Vorpal Spikes
E.description: Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.3*Bonus AP) plus [0]% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by 30/35/40/45/50% for 1.5 seconds, decaying over the duration. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks. Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack. Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at 60/80/100/120/140.

R.name: Feast
R.description: Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing 300/475/650 (+ [0]) (+0.5*Bonus AP) true damage to champions or 1000 (+ [0]) (+0.5*Bonus AP) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain 80/120/160 maximum health. Only 6 total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: [0]/6)

P.name: Hextech Munitions
P.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

Q.name: Phosphorus Bomb
Q.description: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.5*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AD) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

W.name: Valkyrie
W.description: Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path. Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by 90% and burns them for [0] (+ [0]) (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage per second.

E.name: Gatling Gun
E.description: Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for 4 seconds, dealing up to 120/170/220/270/320 (+1.6*Bonus AD) damage and reducing up to 8/11/14/17/20 armor and magic resist. Gatling Gun's damage is 50% physical, 50% magic. Defense reductions last for 2 seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

R.name: Missile Barrage
R.description: Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing 75/100/125 (+10*Bonus AD) (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to all nearby enemies. Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing [0]% damage (0*Bonus AD).

P.name: Hemorrhage
P.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

Q.name: Decimate
Q.description: After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take 40/70/100/130/160 (+1.05*Bonus AD) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take 35% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage). Darius heals for 12% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: 36%).

W.name: Crippling Strike
W.description: Darius's next basic attack deals [0] physical damage and slows the target by 90% for 1 second(s). Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and 50% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

E.name: Apprehend
E.description: Passive: Darius gains 15/20/25/30/35% Armor Penetration. Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by 40% for 1 second(s).

R.name: Noxian Guillotine
R.description: Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing 100/200/300 (+0.75*Bonus AD) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional 20% damage. Maximum Damage: 0*Bonus AD If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds. At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

P.name: Moonsilver Blade
P.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

Q.name: Crescent Strike
Q.description: Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage. Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.

W.name: Pale Cascade
W.description: Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing 22/34/46/58/70 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage. Lasts 5 seconds. Grants a temporary shield that absorbs 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.3*Bonus AP) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.3*Bonus AP) .

E.name: Moonfall
E.description: Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade to 50/60/70/80/90%. Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by 35/40/45/50/55% for 2 seconds.

R.name: Lunar Rush
R.description: Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing 100/160/220 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

P.name: League of Draven
P.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

Q.name: Spinning Axe
Q.description: Draven's next attack will deal 0.45/0.55/0.65/0.75/0.85*Bonus AD bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to 35/40/45/50/55 plus 65/75/85/95/105% of his bonus Attack Damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

W.name: Blood Rush
W.description: Draven gains 40/45/50/55/60% increased Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds and 20/25/30/35/40% increased Attack Speed for 3 seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

E.name: Stand Aside
E.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing 75/110/145/180/215 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 2 seconds.

R.name: Whirling Death
R.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal 175/275/375 (+1.1*Bonus AD) physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum 40%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

P.name: Adrenaline Rush
P.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

Q.name: Infected Cleaver
Q.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% of the target's current health as magic damage (no less than 80/130/180/230/280) and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds. If the cleaver hits, [0] health is refunded ( [0] if the cleaver kills). Infected Cleaver deals no more than 300/350/400/450/500 damage against monsters.

W.name: Burning Agony
W.description: Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies every second. While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by 10/15/20/25/30%.

E.name: Masochism
E.description: Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by 2% for seconds, up to a maximum of [0]%. Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional [0] physical damage (3/3.5/4/4.5/5% of maximum health) at the cost of 25/35/45/55/65 health. Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to 60/90/120/150/180 attack damage (no less than 30/45/60/75/90) for 5 seconds based on his missing health. Masochism grants [0] attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health ( [0] ) .

R.name: Sadism
R.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates [0] Health (50/75/100% of max health) over 12 seconds, and gains 15/25/35% movement speed for the duration.

P.name: Z-Drive Resonance
P.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

Q.name: Timewinder
Q.description: Ekko throws a device that deals 60/75/90/105/120 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by 32/39/46/53/60%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

W.name: Parallel Convergence
W.description: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to 3% (+0.03*Bonus AP%) of their missing health. Deals a minimum of 15 damage, and a maximum of 150 damage vs. minions and monsters. Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by %. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to 80/100/120/140/160 (+1.5*Bonus AP) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for 1.75 seconds.

E.name: Phase Dive
E.description: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.4*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

R.name: Chronobreak
R.description: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals 150/300/450 (+1.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for 100/150/200 (+0.6*Bonus AP) , increased by 3% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.

P.name: Spider Queen
P.description: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.  Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

Q.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
Q.description: Deals magic damage equal to 40/75/110/145/180 plus 4% (+0.03*Bonus AP%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: 75/100/125/150/175.

W.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
W.description: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.95*Bonus AP) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

E.name: Cocoon / Rappel
E.description: Stuns the first enemy hit for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

R.name: Spider Form
R.description: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for 25 movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes. Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal 10/15/20/25 (+0.15*Bonus AP) damage and take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

P.name: Demon Shade
P.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

Q.name: Hate Spike
Q.description: Evelynn's Lasher strikes in the target direction, dealing 25/30/35/40/45 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first unit hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 spells or attacks on that unit deal 10/20/30/40/50 (+0.25*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage. Then, Evelynn can recast this ability up to 3 times. Recast: Fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing 25/30/35/40/45 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to all units hit. Refunds 60% of Hate Spike's cooldown if the Lasher hits a monster. Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

W.name: Allure
W.description: Curses target champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with a basic attack or ability, she will expunge the Curse, refund its mana cost, and briefly slow the target by 65%. If the Curse lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it Charms the target for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s) and: Against champions: shreds Magic Resist by 25/27.5/30/32.5/35% for seconds. Against monsters: deals 250/300/350/400/450 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. Charm duration increased by 2 seconds. Casting Allure does not remove Evelynn from Demon Shade.

E.name: Whiplash
E.description: Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to 0.4*Bonus AD plus 3% (+0.015*Bonus AP%) of their max health. Then, gain 30% movement speed for 2 seconds. Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to [0] plus 4% (+0.025*Bonus AP%) of their max health.

R.name: Last Caress
R.description: Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, becoming untargetable and decimating enemies in front of her. She then warps backwards. Deals 250/500/750 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage, increased to [0] (+ [0]) to enemies below 30% health.

P.name: Rising Spell Force
P.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.

Q.name: Mystic Shot
Q.description: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing [0] physical damage (applies on-hit effects). Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by [0] seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

W.name: Essence Flux
W.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit for [0] seconds. Hitting the orb with an ability or attack detonates it dealing [0] magic damage . Detonating with an ability refunds the cost of that ability + [0] mana.

E.name: Arcane Shift
E.description: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing [0] magic damage . Arcane Shift will prioritize targets stuck with Essence Flux.

R.name: Trueshot Barrage
R.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals [0] magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals [0]% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum [0]%).

P.name: Dread
P.description: Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.  Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.

Q.name: Terrify
Q.description: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 seconds.

W.name: Drain
W.description: Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing 80/105/130/155/180 (+0.45*Bonus AP) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for 60/65/70/75/80% of the damage dealt. Drain lasts up to 5 seconds, dealing a total of [0] (+ [0]) damage. Drain returns cooldown equal to its remaining duration if the target dies.

E.name: Dark Wind
E.description: Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.45*Bonus AP) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for 1.25 seconds the first time per cast. Dark Wind can strike up to 6 times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals 200% damage to monsters.

R.name: Crowstorm
R.description: Fiddlesticks channels for 1.5 seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing 125/225/325 (+0.45*Bonus AP) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area. The effect lasts for 5 seconds, dealing up to [0] (+ [0]) total magic damage.

P.name: Duelist's Dance
P.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

Q.name: Lunge
Q.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing 70/80/90/100/110 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill. If this ability hits an enemy, 60% of its cooldown is refunded.

W.name: Riposte
W.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next 0.75 seconds and then stabs in the target direction. The stab deals 90/130/170/210/250 (+ [0]) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by 50% for 1.5 seconds. If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

E.name: Bladework
E.description: Fiora gains 50% attack speed for her next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but will apply a 30% slow for 1 second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for [0]% damage ( [0]) .

R.name: Grand Challenge
R.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential [0]% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ( [0]%) while near the target. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in 8 seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for 80/110/140 (+ [0]) each second for between 2 to 5 seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

P.name: Nimble Fighter
P.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

Q.name: Urchin Strike
Q.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing 1*Bonus AD physical damage plus [0] magic damage . This spell applies on-hit effects.

W.name: Seastone Trident
W.description: Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing [0] magic damage over [0] seconds. Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals an additional [0] bonus magic damage and empowers Fizz's attacks for [0] seconds, dealing an additional [0] magic damage on hit. If the first attack kills a target, it refunds [0] mana, resets its cooldown to [0] second and does not grant the [0] second on-hit buff.

E.name: Playful / Trickster
E.description: Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable. Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing [0] magic damage to nearby enemies. If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.

R.name: Chum the Waters
R.description: Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first enemy champion it hits, slowing them, granting True Sight , and attracting a shark. After 2 seconds, the shark erupts out of the ground, knocking its target up and knocking other enemies aside. The farther the fish travels before attaching, the bigger the shark it attracts, dealing [0] to [0] magic damage and slowing by 40% to 80%.

P.name: Colossal Smash
P.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.

Q.name: Winds of War
Q.description: Galio fires two windblasts that deal [0] magic damage. When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals [0] plus [0] of enemies' maximum Health (max [0] vs. monsters) as magic damage over [0] seconds.

W.name: Shield of Durand
W.description: Passive: After not taking damage for 12 seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs [0] magic damage. First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining 20/25/30/35/40 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) % Damage Reduction from Magic Damage and [0]% of that amount as Damage Reduction from Physical Damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by 30%. Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for 0.5 to 1.5 seconds, deals [0] (+ [0]) to [0] (+ [0]) damage, and refreshes the Damage Reduction for 2 seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and radius increase with charge time. Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

E.name: Justice Punch
E.description: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing [0] magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for [0] seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.

R.name: Hero's Entrance
R.description: Galio designates an allied champion's current position as his landing spot and grants [0] damage reduction to that ally until he lands. When Galio lands, enemies in the area take [0] magic damage and are knocked into the air for [0] seconds ( [0] seconds in the center).

P.name: Trial by Fire
P.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

Q.name: Parrrley
Q.description: Fires a bullet that deals 20/45/70/95/120 ( +1*Bonus AD ) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects). If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders 3/4/5/6/7 bonus Gold and 4/5/6/7/8 Silver Serpents . (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

W.name: Remove Scurvy
W.description: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for 50/75/100/125/150 (+0.9*Bonus AP) + 15% of his missing Health .

E.name: Powder Keg
E.description: Places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at a location for 25 seconds. If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores % Armor) to enemies and slowing them by 40/50/60/70/80% for 2 seconds. Champions take 60/90/120/150/180 bonus physical damage from the explosion. When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack). Kegs health decays every [0] seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13) Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

R.name: Cannon Barrage
R.description: Signals Gangplank's ship to fire [0] waves of cannonballs at an area over 8 seconds. Each wave deals 35/60/85 (+0.1*Bonus AP) magic damage and slows enemies by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

P.name: Perseverance
P.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

Q.name: Decisive Strike
Q.description: Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains 30% movement speed for 1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5 seconds. His next basic attack within 4.5 seconds deals 30/60/90/120/150 (+1.4*Bonus AD) physical damage and silences his target for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Courage
W.description: Passive: Killing units permanently grants [0] armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of 40. Current Bonus: [0] Active: Garen steels his courage for 2/3/4/5/6 seconds. For the first 0.75 seconds, he takes 60% less damage and gains 60% Tenacity. For the remaining duration, he takes 30% less damage.

E.name: Judgment
E.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for 3 seconds, dealing [0] physical damage to nearby enemies -- 14/18/22/26/30 plus 36/37/38/39/40% of his attack damage (+ [0]) , [0] times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration. Enemy champions hit by 4 spins lose 25% of their armor for 6 seconds. Judgment deals 33% increased damage when striking only one enemy. Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration. Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

R.name: Demacian Justice
R.description: Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain . Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional 1% of its maximum health as true damage. Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to 175/350/525 plus 28/33/40% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain .

P.name: Rage Gene
P.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

Q.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
Q.description: Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals 5/45/85/125/165 (+1.15*Bonus AD) physical damage and slows enemies by 15/20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by [0]%. Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing 5/45/85/125/165 (+1.2*Bonus AD) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by 60%.

W.name: Hyper / Wallop
W.description: Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional 10/20/30/40/50 (+1*Bonus AP) + 6/8/10/12/14% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar [0]% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max 100/150/200/250/300 damage vs. monsters). Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for 1.25 seconds, dealing 25/45/65/85/105 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage. Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

E.name: Hop / Crunch
E.description: Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining 20/30/40/50/60% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals 50/85/120/155/190 (+ [0]) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy. Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals 50/85/120/155/190 (+ [0]) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly. If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

R.name: GNAR!
R.description: Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to 45/60/75%. Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing 200/300/400 (+0.2*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AP) physical damage and slowing them by 45% for 1.25/1.5/1.75 seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take 150% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.

P.name: Happy Hour
P.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

Q.name: Barrel Roll
Q.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after 4 seconds, the cask will explode, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds. The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds. Deals 70% damage to minions.

W.name: Drunken Rage
W.description: Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking 10/12/14/16/18% (+ [0]%) reduced damage for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.5*Bonus AP) plus 8% of their max Health (max 300 vs monsters).

E.name: Body Slam
E.description: Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for 1 second. Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by [0] seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

R.name: Explosive Cask
R.description: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take 200/300/400 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.

P.name: New Destiny
P.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

Q.name: End of the Line
Q.description: Fires a powder round that deals 45/60/75/90/105 (+ [0]) physical damage to enemies in a line. After 2 seconds or 0.2 seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing 85/115/145/175/205 (+ [0]) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

W.name: Smoke Screen
W.description: Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage and have their movement speed reduced by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

E.name: Quickdraw
E.description: Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by 0.5 seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit . True Grit grants 5/7.5/10/12.5/15 Armor (stacks up to times).

R.name: Collateral Damage
R.description: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals 250/400/550 (+ [0]) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing 200/320/440 (+ [0]) physical damage in a cone.

P.name: Warpath
P.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

Q.name: Rampage
Q.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for 55/95/135/175/215 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage. (66% damage to minions) If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by 1 second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

W.name: Spirit of Dread
W.description: Hecarim deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage over 4 seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for 30% of the damage these enemies take from any source. Hecarim cannot heal more than 90/120/150/180/210 Health from minions or monsters.

E.name: Devastating Charge
E.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for 4 seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing 45/80/115/150/185 (+0.5*Bonus AD) to 90/160/230/300/370 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales). Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.

R.name: Onslaught of Shadows
R.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing 150/250/350 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for 0.75 to 1.5 seconds (increases by charge distance). Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

P.name: Hextech Affinity
P.description: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

Q.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
Q.description: Places a Turret. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Turrets shut down if Heimerdinger moves far away. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every 0*Bonus AD seconds and can hold 3 Kits at once. H-28G Evolution Turret Stats Health: 150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575*Bonus AD (+0*Bonus AD) Attack - Cannon: 6/9/12/15/18 (+0.3*Bonus AP) Magic Damage. Attack - Beam: 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.55*Bonus AP) Magic Damage every 90 seconds. Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

W.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
W.description: Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.45*Bonus AP) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage: Champions and Monsters: 12/18/24/30/36 (+0.12*Bonus AP) Magic Damage, max 108/162/216/270/324 (+0.93*Bonus AD) total damage Minions: 60% of base damage Rocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.

E.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
E.description: Hurls a grenade that deals 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.6*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to enemies and slows their Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for 1.25 seconds. Hitting a champion fully charges nearby turret beams.

R.name: UPGRADE!!!
R.description: Makes Heimerdinger's next ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel. H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret for 8 seconds that deals 80/100/120 (+0.3*Bonus AP) Magic Damage with its cannon and 100/140/180 (+0.7*Bonus AP) Magic Damage with its beam. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow by 25% for 2 seconds and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit. Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that each deal 135/180/225 (+0*Bonus AD) Magic Damage. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max 500/690/865 (+1.83*Bonus AD) . CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing (+0.6*Bonus AD) Magic Damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

P.name: Prophet of an Elder God
P.description: Illaoi and the Vessels  she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels , and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

Q.name: Tentacle Smash
Q.description: Passive: Slam damage is increased by 10/15/20/25/30% ( [0] ). Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

W.name: Harsh Lesson
W.description: Illaoi leaps at her target on her next basic attack, dealing bonus physical damage equal to [0]% of their maximum health [3/3.5/4/4.5/5% + [0]% per 100 attack damage]. When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will Slam at the target. Harsh Lesson's bonus damage against monsters is capped at 300 damage per hit.

E.name: Test of Spirit
E.description: Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for 10 seconds (reduced when Illaoi is attacked by the target). The spirit can be attacked, with 25/30/35/40/45% (+ [0]%) of the damage taken echoing to its owner. If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes a Vessel for 12 seconds and is slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds. Vessels spawn Tentacles every [0] seconds if no other Tentacles are nearby. Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and Vessels once every 10 seconds.

R.name: Leap of Faith
R.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing 150/250/350 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit. For the next 8 seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown. 'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'

P.name: Ionian Fervor
P.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains a stacking bonus damage buff on her basic attacks. At maximum stacks she also gains Attack Speed and deals bonus damage to shields.

Q.name: Bladesurge
Q.description: Irelia dashes to an enemy, dealing [0] physical damage, applying on-hit effects and healing for [0] health. Bladesurge's cooldown is reset if the target was Marked or dies to Bladesurge. Bladesurge deals [0] damage to minions.

W.name: Defiant Dance
W.description: First Cast: Irelia aligns her blades into a defensive formation, gaining [0]% damage reduction and a stack of Ionian Fervor but becoming unable to act. Second Cast: Irelia swipes her blades, dealing [0] physical damage. Damage increases with charge time, up to [0] after [0] seconds. Defiant Dance cannot be interrupted.

E.name: Flawless Duet
E.description: Irelia readies 2 blades that will fly towards each other once placed, dealing [0] magic damage and stunning for [0] seconds. Champions and large monsters are Marked for [0] seconds.

R.name: Vanguard's Edge
R.description: Irelia launches a storm of blades that explode outward upon hitting a champion. The blades deal [0] magic damage and Mark champions and large monsters for [0] seconds. Irelia then forms the blades into a wall for [0] seconds. Passing through the wall deals [0] magic damage, slows by [0]% and disarms for [0] seconds.

P.name: Friend of the Forest
P.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

Q.name: Rootcaller
Q.description: Ivern conjures a vine dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+ [0]) magic damage and rooting the first enemy hit for 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2 second(s). Allies can click on rooted enemies to dash into attack range.

W.name: Brushmaker
W.description: Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal 30/37.5/45/52.5/60 (+ [0]) bonus magic damage. Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for 30 seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.

E.name: Triggerseed
E.description: Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to 80/115/150/185/220 (+ [0]) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+ [0]) magic damage and slowing enemies by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds. Can also be cast on Daisy.

R.name: Daisy!
R.description: Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for [0] seconds. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy has: Health: 1250/2500/3750 (+ [0]) Armor and Magic Resist: 15/40/90 (+ [0]) Attack Damage: [0] (+ [0]) Recast to manually issue orders to Daisy.

P.name: Tailwind
P.description: Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.  Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

Q.name: Howling Gale
Q.description: Summons a whirlwind, which deals 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.35*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for 0.5 seconds. The whirlwind can be charged up to 3 seconds. For each second charged, it: Deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.1*Bonus AP) bonus damage Knocks up for an additional 0.25 seconds Travels 25% further Howling Gale always reaches its destination in 1.5 seconds. Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

W.name: Zephyr
W.description: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna gains 6/7/8/9/10% (+0.02*Bonus AP%) Movement Speed and can move through units. Active: Deals 55/100/145/190/235 (+0.5*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by 24/28/32/36/40% (+0.06*Bonus AP%) for 2 seconds.

E.name: Eye Of The Storm
E.description: Grants an allied champion or turret a shield that decays over 5 seconds. The shield absorbs up to 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.7*Bonus AP) damage and grants 10/17.5/25/32.5/40 (+0.1*Bonus AP) attack damage until it is fully depleted.

R.name: Monsoon
R.description: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores 100/150/200 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Health to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

P.name: Martial Cadence
P.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

Q.name: Dragon Strike
Q.description: Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+1.2*Bonus AD) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by 10/14/18/22/26% for 3 seconds. If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

W.name: Golden Aegis
W.description: Grants a shield that absorbs 60/85/110/135/160 ( + [0] [2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3% max Health] for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by 15/20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds.

E.name: Demacian Standard
E.description: Passive: Gains 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% Attack Speed. Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for 8 seconds and grants surrounding allied champions 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% Attack Speed.

R.name: Cataclysm
R.description: Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing 200/325/450 (+1.5*Bonus AD) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds. Activate again to collapse the terrain.

P.name: Relentless Assault
P.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

Q.name: Leap Strike
Q.description: Jax leaps to target unit, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.6*Bonus AP) physical damage if it is an enemy.

W.name: Empower
W.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.6*Bonus AP) Magic Damage.

E.name: Counter Strike
E.description: Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking 25% less damage from area of effect abilities. After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for 1 second and deals 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage to them. Counter Strike deals 20% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: 100% increased damage).

R.name: Grandmaster's Might
R.description: Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals 100/160/220 (+0.7*Bonus AP) additional Magic Damage. Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him 0.3*Bonus AD Armor and 0.2*Bonus AD Magic Resist for 8 seconds. Armor bonus is equal to 30/50/70 + 50% bonus Attack Damage. Magic Resist bonus is equal to 30/50/70 + 20% Ability Power.

P.name: Hextech Capacitor
P.description: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.

Q.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
Q.description: Leaps to an enemy dealing 45/80/115/150/185/220 (+1.2*Bonus AD) physical damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30/35/40/45/50/55% for 2 seconds.

W.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
W.description: Passive: Gains 6/8/10/12/14/16 Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance. Active: Creates an electric aura dealing 100/160/220/280/340/400 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies.

E.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
E.description: Deals 8/10.4/12.8/15.2/17.6/20% of the target's maximum health (+1*Bonus AD) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. (200/300/400/500/600/700 Maximum Damage against monsters)

R.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
R.description: Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks. The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist by [0]% for 5 seconds.

P.name: Whisper
P.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

Q.name: Dancing Grenade
Q.description: Jhin launches a cartridge at the targeted enemy that deals 45/70/95/120/145 (+ [0]) (+0.6*Bonus AP) physical damage before bouncing to a nearby target that has not yet been hit. The cartridge can hit a maximum of 4 times. Each kill by the cartridge increases the damage of subsequent hits by 35%.

W.name: Deadly Flourish
W.description: Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing 50/85/120/155/190 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage to it, and 75% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way. If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's Lotus Traps, damaged by Jhin, or damaged by his team within the last 4 seconds, it will root them for 0.75/1/1.25/1.5/1.75 seconds and grant Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.

E.name: Captive Audience
E.description: Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap that lasts 2 minutes and activates when stepped on, revealing nearby enemies for 4 seconds. The trap leaves behind a zone that slows enemies inside by 35% and detonates after 2 seconds, dealing 20/80/140/200/260 (+1.2*Bonus AD) (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage (65% damage on subsequent hits and vs. minions and monsters). Jhin prepares a new trap every [0] seconds and can store 2 at once. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion a Lotus Trap will spawn and detonate where they were killed.

R.name: Curtain Call
R.description: Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots at extreme range in a cone in front of him. The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by 80% for 0.5 seconds and dealing 50/125/200 (+0.2*Bonus AD) physical damage, increased by 2.5% for each 1% health the target is missing (up to [0] (+ [0]) ). The 4th shot crits for [0]% damage.

P.name: Get Excited!
P.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

Q.name: Switcheroo!
Q.description: Jinx swaps weapons. Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain 75/100/125/150/175 range, drain Mana, and scale 25% less with bonus Attack Speed. Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of 30/55/80/105/130%. Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

W.name: Zap!
W.description: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals 10/60/110/160/210 (+1.6*Bonus AD) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by 30/40/50/60/70% for 2 seconds.

E.name: Flame Chompers!
E.description: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and stopping in-progress movement abilities on the spot before dealing 70/120/170/220/270 (+1*Bonus AP) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

R.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
R.description: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing 25/35/45 (+0.15*Bonus AD) to 250/350/450 (+1.5*Bonus AD) Physical Damage plus 25/30/35% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.

P.name: Second Skin
P.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

Q.name: Icathian Rain
Q.description: Kai'Sa launches 6 missiles that split among nearby enemies, each dealing 45/61.25/77.5/93.75/110 (+0.6/0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2*Bonus AD) (+ [0]) physical damage. Additional hits on a champion or monster deal 30% damage (max: [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) ). Living Weapon - 100 Bonus Attack Damage ( current: [0] ) - Icathian Rain fires 10 missiles. Minions below 35% health take 200% damage.

W.name: Void Seeker
W.description: Kai'Sa fires a Void blast that grants True Sight on the first enemy hit, and triggers 2 stacks of Plasma , dealing magic damage based on the target's stacks. Min Damage: 20/45/70/95/120 ( + [0] ) (+0.6*Bonus AD) (+ [0]) Max Damage: 20/45/70/95/120 ( + [0] ) (+0.6*Bonus AD) (+ [0]) Living Weapon - 100 Ability Power ( current: [0] ) - Void Seeker triggers 3 stacks of Plasma and refunds 50% cooldown on champion hit.

E.name: Supercharge
E.description: Kai'Sa spends [0] seconds Supercharging her Void Energy. She gains [0]% Movement Speed during the charge, and 40/50/60/70/80% Attack Speed for 4 seconds when charged. Living Weapon - 100% Attack Speed ( current: [0]% ) - Supercharge grants Invisibility for 0.5 seconds. Basic attacks reduce Supercharge's cooldown by 0.5 seconds. Supercharge's cast time and Movement Speed improve with Attack Speed.

R.name: Killer Instinct
R.description: Kai'Sa warps to a location near an enemy champion affected by Plasma , gaining a shield that absorbs 75/100/125 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) damage for 2 seconds.

P.name: Martial Poise
P.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

Q.name: Pierce
Q.description: Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals 10/70/130/190/250 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P) , Sentinel (W) , and Rend (E) . If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

W.name: Sentinel
W.description: Passive: When Kalista is near her Oathsworn , she gains 5/10/15/20/25 Attack Damage. If they both basic attack the same target, she deals 5/7.5/10/12.5/15% of their max health as magic damage. 10 second cooldown per target. Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps. Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every 90/80/70/60/50 seconds.

E.name: Rend
E.description: Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds. Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 25/30/35/40/45% for 2 seconds. Each additional spear deals 10/14/19/25/32 (+ [0]) physical damage. If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and it refunds 10/15/20/25/30 mana.

R.name: Fate's Call
R.description: Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified. The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back. Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.

P.name: Gathering Fire
P.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

Q.name: Inner Flame
Q.description: Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds. Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals 25/75/125/175*Bonus AD (+0.3*Bonus AP) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame that slows enemies by [0]%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing 50/150/250/350*Bonus AD (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies in the area.

W.name: Focused Resolve
W.description: Links Karma to an enemy champion or monster, granting True Sight and dealing [0] (+ [0]) magic damage. If the link is unbroken for 2 seconds, the target is rooted for 1.4/1.55/1.7/1.85/2 second(s) and takes an additional [0] (+ [0]) magic damage. Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for 75/150/225/300*Bonus AD% (+ [0]%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by [0] second(s) and Karma is healed for 75/150/225/300*Bonus AD% (+ [0]%) of her missing health.

E.name: Inspire
E.description: Target ally gains a shield, granting 40/45/50/55/60% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds and absorbing 70/95/120/145/170 (+0.5*Bonus AP) damage for 2.5 seconds. Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional 60/140/220/300*Bonus AD (+0.6*Bonus AP) damage. Nearby allied champions gain shields that absorb [0]% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded gain [0]% movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Mantra
R.description: Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect. Soulflare: Deals bonus damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, slowing enemies and dealing additional damage. Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the link is unbroken the root is longer and Karma is healed again. Defiance: The shield is stronger and allied champions around the target also gain a shield and movement speed.

P.name: Death Defied
P.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

Q.name: Lay Waste
Q.description: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing 50/70/90/110/130 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to each nearby enemy. If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

W.name: Wall of Pain
W.description: Creates a wall that lasts for 5 seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by 15% and Movement Speed reduced by 40/50/60/70/80% for 5 seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

E.name: Defile
E.description: Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores 20/27/34/41/48 Mana. Toggle On: Drains [0] Mana to deal 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

R.name: Requiem
R.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals 250/400/550 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

P.name: Void Stone
P.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

Q.name: Null Sphere
Q.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy that deals 65/95/125/155/185 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and interrupts channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Nether Blade
W.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing 20 (+0.1*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.8*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage and restore 4/5/6/7/8% of his missing Mana (increases to 20/25/30/35/40% against champions).

E.name: Force Pulse
E.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal 80/105/130/155/180 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and slow enemies by 50/60/70/80/90% for 1 second in a cone in front of him.

R.name: Riftwalk
R.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing 80/100/120 (+ [0]) (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next 15 seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional 40/50/60 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage per stack, stacking up to 4 times.

P.name: Voracity
P.description: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.  If Katarina picks up a Dagger , she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

Q.name: Bouncing Blade
Q.description: Katarina throws a Dagger , dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target. The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.

W.name: Preparation
W.description: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air and gains 50/60/70/80/90% decaying movement speed over 1.25 seconds.

E.name: Shunpo
E.description: Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger . If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for 15/30/45/60/75 (+0.5*Bonus AD) (+0.25*Bonus AP) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range. Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by [0] seconds ( [0]% ). Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

R.name: Death Lotus
R.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly throwing knives at the three nearest enemy champions, dealing 25/37.5/50 (+0.22*Bonus AD) (+0.19*Bonus AP) magic damage per knife. Total over 2.5 seconds to each enemy: 3*Bonus AD (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage. Applies Grievous Wounds to all enemies struck, reducing their healing and regeneration by 40%.

P.name: Holy Fervor
P.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Q.name: Reckoning
Q.description: Blasts an enemy, dealing 60/110/160/210/260 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by 35/40/45/50/55% for 3 seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

W.name: Divine Blessing
W.description: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by 18/21/24/27/30% (+0.07*Bonus AP%) for 3 seconds and healing them for 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.45*Bonus AP) Health.

E.name: Righteous Fury
E.description: Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional 10/15/20/25/30 (+0.15*Bonus AP) magic damage on hit. Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit. In addition, deals 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35/0.4*Bonus AD) (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and applies spell effects on attack to enemies near her target.

R.name: Intervention
R.description: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for 2/2.5/3 seconds.

P.name: The Darkin Scythe
P.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

Q.name: Reaping Slash
Q.description: Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65*Bonus AD) physical damage. Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead. Deals 55 bonus physical damage to monsters.

W.name: Blade's Reach
W.description: Kayn deals 90/135/180/225/270 (+1.3*Bonus AD) physical damage and slows enemies hit by 60%, decaying over the next 1.5 seconds. Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach. Darkin: Gain a knock up.

E.name: Shadow Step
E.description: Kayn gains 40% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for 7/7.5/8/8.5/9 seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for 100/115/130/145/160 (+0.4*Bonus AD) . Shadow Assassin: Gain more movement speed and slow immunity. Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects and spending more than 1.5 consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.

R.name: Umbral Trespass
R.description: Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged , becoming untargetable for up to 2.5 seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes 150/250/350 (+1.75*Bonus AD) physical damage. Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range and refresh The Darkin Scythe on exit. Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.

P.name: Mark of the Storm
P.description: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.   The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

Q.name: Thundering Shuriken
Q.description: Throws a shuriken that deals 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

W.name: Electrical Surge
W.description: Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to 10/20/30/40/50 (+ [0]) (+0.2*Bonus AP) and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target. Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage.

E.name: Lightning Rush
E.description: Kennen turns into a ball of lightning for up to [0] seconds, dealing [0] (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies he passes through. While a ball of lightning, Kennen gains [0] armor and magic resist, and [0]% movement speed. Kennen is refunded [0] energy if he damages at least one enemy in this form. Upon returning to his normal form, Kennen gains [0]% attack speed for [0] seconds. Lightning Rush deals [0]% damage to minions. Kennen ignores unit collision while he is a ball of lightning.

R.name: Slicing Maelstrom
R.description: Summons a magical storm for 3 seconds that deals 40/75/110 (+0.2*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every 0.5 seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3. Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional 10% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

P.name: Unseen Threat
P.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

Q.name: Taste Their Fear
Q.description: Deals 50/75/100/125/150 (+1.3*Bonus AD) physical damage. If the target is Isolated , the damage is increased by 100% ( [0] ). Evolved Reaper Claws: Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by 50. If target is Isolated , refunds 45% of Taste Their Fear's cooldown.

W.name: Void Spike
W.description: Fires exploding spikes, dealing 85/115/145/175/205 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies hit. Heals Kha'Zix for 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.5*Bonus AP) if he is within the explosion radius. Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by 60% for 2 seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for 90% instead.

E.name: Leap
E.description: Leaps to target area, dealing 65/100/135/170/205 (+0.2*Bonus AD) physical damage. Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

R.name: Void Assault
R.description: Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities. Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for 1.25 seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible , he gains 40% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be used again within 10 seconds of the initial use, up to 2 times total. Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: Void Assault's uses are increased to 3 within 10 seconds, and its stealth duration is increased to 2 seconds. Stealth - Invisible : Kha'Zix can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight .

P.name: Mark of the Kindred
P.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

Q.name: Dance of Arrows
Q.description: Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65*Bonus AD) physical damage and gains [0]% bonus attack speed for 4 seconds. Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to 4/3.5/3/2.5/2 seconds.

W.name: Wolf's Frenzy
W.description: Passive: As Kindred move and attack they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack restores up to [0] health based on how much health Kindred is missing. Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for 8.5 seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her. Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to 25/30/35/40/45 (+0.2*Bonus AD) plus [0]% of the target's current health. Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for 50% increased damage and reduce their Movement Speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

E.name: Mounting Dread
E.description: Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by 50% for 1 second. After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing 80/100/120/140/160 (+0.8*Bonus AD) plus [0]% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage. Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for 50% increased damage if they are below 15% (+ [0]%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance ). [Maximum vs. monsters]

R.name: Lamb's Respite
R.description: Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for 4 seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy , can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing. When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for 200/250/300.

P.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
P.description: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.  While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

Q.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
Q.description: Kled throws a bear trap that deals 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight . Deals 150% damage to minions passed through. If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for 1.75 seconds, he deals 60/110/160/210/260 (+ [0]) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by 40/45/50/55/60% for 1.5 seconds. Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage .

W.name: Violent Tendencies
W.description: Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining 150% attack speed for four attacks or 4 seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown. The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to 20/30/40/50/60 plus 4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5% (+ [0]%) of the target's maximum health (maximum 200 vs monsters).

E.name: Jousting
E.description: Kled dashes, dealing 35/60/85/110/135 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls. If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains 50% movement speed for 1 second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within 3 seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

R.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
R.description: Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of 200/300/400 (+3*Bonus AD) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends. Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to [0]% (+ [0]%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

P.name: Icathian Surprise
P.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

Q.name: Caustic Spittle
Q.description: Passive: Kog'Maw gains 15/20/25/30/35% bonus attack speed. Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by 20/22/24/26/28% for 4 seconds.

W.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
W.description: For 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain 130/150/170/190/210 range and deal 3/3.75/4.5/5.25/6% (+ [0])% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

E.name: Void Ooze
E.description: Deals 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for 4 seconds, slowing enemies in it by 20/28/36/44/52%.

R.name: Living Artillery
R.description: Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for 100/140/180 (+0.65*Bonus AD) (+0.25*Bonus AP) to [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage based on their missing health. If enemies are below 40% health, they take [0] (+ [0]) (+ [0]) magic damage instead. Each subsequent shot within 8 seconds costs 40 more Mana (max 400).

P.name: Mirror Image
P.description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.  Mirror Image has a 1 minute cooldown.   Mirror Image can be controlled by holding the Alt key and using the right mouse button.

Q.name: Sigil of Malice
Q.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage.

W.name: Distortion
W.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

E.name: Ethereal Chains
E.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage and granting True Sight of the target. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them for 1.5 seconds and deals an additional 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage.

R.name: Mimic
R.description: LeBlanc mimics her most recent spell, casting it again. Mimicked Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains deal [0] (+ [0]) magic damage, plus [0] (+ [0]) magic damage from their mark and root, respectively. Mimicked Distortion deals [0] (+ [0]) magic damage.

P.name: Flurry
P.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

Q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
Q.description: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds. Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+1*Bonus AD) to 100/150/200/250/300 (+2*Bonus AD) physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

W.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
W.description: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for 55/110/165/220/275 (+0.8*Bonus AP) damage for 2 seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by 50%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds. Iron Will: Lee Sin gains 10/15/20/25/30% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for 4 seconds.

E.name: Tempest / Cripple
E.description: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+1*Bonus AD) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds. Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for 4 seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by 20/30/40/50/60%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

R.name: Dragon's Rage
R.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing 150/375/600 (+2*Bonus AD) physical damage. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to 150/375/600 (+2*Bonus AD) plus 12/15/18% of the initial target's bonus health.

P.name: Sunlight
P.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

Q.name: Shield of Daybreak
Q.description: Next basic attack deals 10/35/60/85/110 (+0.3*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage and stuns for 1 second.

W.name: Eclipse
W.description: Grants 25/35/45/55/65 (+0.2*Bonus AD) bonus Armor and 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.2*Bonus AD) Magic Resist for 3 seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.

E.name: Zenith Blade
E.description: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for 0.5 seconds and Leona will dash to them.

R.name: Solar Flare
R.description: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing 100/175/250 (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing enemies by 80% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed. Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence , causing her next 3/4/5 basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal 30/40/50 (+0.15*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage on hit.

P.name: Iceborn
P.description: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).

Q.name: Ice Shard
Q.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by 16/19/22/25/28% for 1.5 seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

W.name: Ring of Frost
W.description: Deals 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.

E.name: Glacial Path
E.description: Casts an ice claw that deals 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

R.name: Frozen Tomb
R.description: On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for 1.5 seconds. On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for 2.5 seconds, healing for 100/150/200 (+0.3*Bonus AP) , increased by 1% for each 1% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing 150/250/350 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for 3 seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by 30/45/75%.

P.name: Lightslinger
P.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

Q.name: Piercing Light
Q.description: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for 85/120/155/190/225 (+0.6/0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2*Bonus AD) (60/75/90/105/120% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

W.name: Ardent Blaze
W.description: Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals 85/125/165/205/245 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds. When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains 60/65/70/75/80 Movement Speed for 1 second.

E.name: Relentless Pursuit
E.description: Quickly dashes a short distance. Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by 1 second (doubles to 2 seconds against champions).

R.name: The Culling
R.description: Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for 3 seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do 20/35/50 (+0.1*Bonus AP) (+0.25*Bonus AD) physical damage. The Culling does 200% damage to minions. Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling. Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

P.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
P.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

Q.name: Glitterlance
Q.description: Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit and [0] (+ [0]) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by 80%, decaying over the next 2 second(s). An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of [0] damage per cast.

W.name: Whimsy
W.description: On Ally Cast: Target ally gains 30 (+0.05*Bonus AP) % Movement Speed and 25/30/35/40/45% Attack Speed for 3/3.25/3.5/3.75/4 seconds. On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by 60.

E.name: Help, Pix!
