W.description: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by 20/35/50/65/80 for 4 seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by 30/37.5/45/52.5/60% for 4 seconds.

E.name: Spinning Slash
E.description: Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+1.3*Bonus AD) (+1*Bonus AP) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury. Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to 2 seconds against champions.

R.name: Undying Rage
R.description: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for 5 seconds, refusing to be reduced below 30/50/70 Health and instantly gaining 50/75/100 Fury.

P.name: Loaded Dice
P.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

Q.name: Wild Cards
Q.description: Throws three cards that deal 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.65*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

W.name: Pick A Card
W.description: Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack. Blue Card deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage and restores 50/75/100/125/150 Mana. Red Card deals 30/45/60/75/90 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by 30/35/40/45/50% for 2.5 seconds. Gold Card deals 15/22.5/30/37.5/45 (+1*Bonus AD) (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage and stuns for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

E.name: Stacked Deck
E.description: Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional 55/80/105/130/155 (+0.5*Bonus AP) Magic Damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by 10/15/20/25/30%.

R.name: Destiny
R.description: Grants True Sight on all enemy champions on the map for 6/8/10 seconds. While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to 5500 units away in 1.5 seconds.

P.name: Deadly Venom
P.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

Q.name: Ambush
Q.description: Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains 10% Movement Speed for 10/11/12/13/14 seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him. Twitch gains 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after exiting Ambush. Ambush resets when a champion dies while affected by Deadly Venom. Stealth - Camouflage: Twitch is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

W.name: Venom Cask
W.description: Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for 3 seconds. Enemies that remain within the cloud have 25/30/35/40/45% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

E.name: Contaminate
E.description: Deals 20/30/40/50/60 physical damage plus 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.2*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom. (Max Stack Damage: [0])

R.name: Spray and Pray
R.description: For 5 seconds Twitch gains 300 Attack Range and 20/30/40 Bonus Attack Damage. For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal 20% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of 40% damage. Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.

P.name: Monkey's Agility
P.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

Q.name: Tiger Stance
Q.description: Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus 30/60/90/120/150 (+1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5/1.6*Bonus AD) physical damage over 2 seconds. If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly. Activation: Increases Attack Speed by 30/40/50/60/70% for 5 seconds. Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

W.name: Turtle Stance
W.description: Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+ [0]) (2.5% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health. Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.5*Bonus AP) damage for 5 seconds. Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

E.name: Bear Stance
E.description: Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 5 seconds. Activation: Increases Movement Speed by 15/20/25/30/35% and ignores unit collision for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3 seconds. Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

R.name: Phoenix Stance
R.description: Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing 40/80/120/160/200 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage. Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing 10/20/30/40/50 (+0.25*Bonus AP) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

P.name: Echoing Flames
P.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

Q.name: Corrosive Charge
Q.description: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing 25/70/115/160/205 (+0.7*Bonus AD) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by 45/50/55/60/65% for 1 second.

W.name: Purge
W.description: For 4 seconds, Urgot shoots at a nearby enemy 3 times a second, dealing 12 (+ [0]) physical damage per shot, locking onto champions recently damaged by his other abilities. He also shields himself, absorbing 60/90/120/150/180 (+ [0]) damage. While firing, Urgot loses 125 movement speed but has 40% slow resistance and can walk over minions and non-epic monsters. Applies on-hits at 33% damage. Cannot critically strike. Minimum of damage to minions.

E.name: Disdain
E.description: Urgot charges forwards. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them behind him, dealing 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Non-champions take the same damage but are knocked aside. Cannot cross terrain.

R.name: Fear Beyond Death
R.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals 50/175/300 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage and slows for 4 seconds by up to 75% based on the victim's missing health. If the victim falls below 25% health while impaled, Urgot may recast this ability, suppressing the victim and dragging them in for execution. Activates automatically if the target is below 25% at the end of the effect. When Urgot executes a victim, nearby enemies flee in terror for seconds.

P.name: Living Vengeance
P.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

Q.name: Piercing Arrow
Q.description: First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds 50% of its Mana cost. Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing 10/47/84/120/157 (+1.1*Bonus AD) to 15/70/125/180/235 (+1.65*Bonus AD) physical damage, reduced by 15% per enemy hit (minimum 33%). Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by 1*Bonus AD seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks on at least one enemy champion.

W.name: Blighted Quiver
W.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal 7/10.5/14/17.5/20 (+0.25*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for 6 seconds (stacks 3 times). Varus' other abilities detonate Blight , dealing magic damage equal to 3/3.5/4/4.5/5% (+0.02*Bonus AP%) of the target's maximum Health per stack. Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals bonus magic damage equal to [0]% to [0]% of the target's missing health (scales with Piercing Arrow charge). Blighted Quiver is capped at 360 damage against monsters.

E.name: Hail of Arrows
E.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.6*Bonus AD) physical damage and desecrates the ground for 4 seconds. Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by 25/30/35/40/45% and reduces healing effects by 40%.

R.name: Chain of Corruption
R.description: Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals 100/175/250 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds. The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain 3 Blight stacks over the duration.

P.name: Night Hunter
P.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

Q.name: Tumble
Q.description: Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals 0.3/0.35/0.4/0.45/0.5*Bonus AD bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within 7 seconds. Tumble's bonus damage is equal to 50/55/60/65/70% of Vayne's total attack damage.

W.name: Silver Bolts
W.description: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional 4/6.5/9/11.5/14% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than 50/65/80/95/110). Silver Bolts deals no more than 200 damage against monsters.

E.name: Condemn
E.description: Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals 50/85/120/155/190 (+0.5*Bonus AD) physical damage. If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to 0.5*Bonus AD and the target is stunned for 1.5 seconds. Condemn's damage is increased by 100% if the target collides with terrain.

R.name: Final Hour
R.description: Vayne gains 20/30/40 bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for 8/10/12 seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by 4 seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within 3 seconds. Night Hunter : Vayne instead gains 90 movement speed. Tumble : Vayne will also gain Invisibility for 1 second when she Tumbles. Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight . Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.

P.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
P.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

Q.name: Baleful Strike
Q.description: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil . Large minions and large monsters grant two.

W.name: Dark Matter
W.description: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing 100/150/200/250/300 (+1*Bonus AP) magic damage. Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently [0]% ).

E.name: Event Horizon
E.description: After a 0.5 second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds.

R.name: Primordial Burst
R.description: Blasts the target enemy champion with primal magic to deal 175/250/325 (+0.75*Bonus AP) to 350/500/650 (+1.5*Bonus AP) magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health . Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.

P.name: Organic Deconstruction
P.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction  to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

Q.name: Plasma Fission
Q.description: Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.8*Bonus AP) Magic Damage and applies a slow of 70% that decays over 1/1.4/1.8/2.2/2.6 second(s). Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle. Killing a unit with this refunds 50% of the Mana Cost .

W.name: Void Rift
W.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.15*Bonus AP) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional 45/75/105/135/165 (+0.25*Bonus AP) Magic Damage. Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

E.name: Tectonic Disruption
E.description: Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.3*Bonus AP) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for 0.75 seconds. Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

R.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
R.description: Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research. Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of 450/625/800 (+1.25*Bonus AP) and slowing units hit by 20%. Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

P.name: Blast Shield
P.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

Q.name: Vault Breaker
Q.description: Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward. First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds. Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing 110/160/210/260/310 (+0.8*Bonus AD) to [0] (+1.4*Bonus AD) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

W.name: Denting Blows
W.description: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional 4/5.5/7/8.5/10% (+35*Bonus AD%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 20% and grants Vi 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (max 300 damage vs. monsters).

E.name: Excessive Force
E.description: Causes next basic attack to deal 10/30/50/70/90 (+1.15*Bonus AD) (+0.7*Bonus AP) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it. Vi charges a new punch every 14/12.5/11/9.5/8*Bonus AD seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

R.name: Assault and Battery
R.description: Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing 150/300/450 (+1.4*Bonus AD) physical damage. While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and has True Sight of the target. Any enemies in the way are knocked aside and dealt 75% of the damage.

P.name: Glorious Evolution
P.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

Q.name: Siphon Power
Q.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage while granting Viktor a shield that absorbs up to [0] (+ [0]) damage over the next 2.5 seconds. Viktor's next basic attack deals 20/45/70/95/120 (+0.55*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage. Augment - Turbocharge: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains 30% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.

W.name: Gravity Field
W.description: Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for 4 seconds, slowing enemy units by 28/32/36/40/44% and adding a stack every 0.5 seconds. At 3 stacks the target is stunned for 1.5 seconds. Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

E.name: Death Ray
E.description: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage to every enemy in its path. Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing 20/60/100/140/180 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage.

R.name: Chaos Storm
R.description: Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing 100/175/250 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. Viktor can redirect the singularity for 6.5 seconds, which will discharge 130/210/290 (+0.85*Bonus AP) magic damage every 2 seconds to nearby enemies. The singularity will move slower as it attempts to move farther away from Viktor. Augment - Velocity: Chaos Storm moves % faster.

P.name: Crimson Pact
P.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

Q.name: Transfusion
Q.description: Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing 80/100/120/140/160 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage and healing himself for 20/25/30/35/40 (+0.35*Bonus AP) health. After casting Transfusion twice, Vladimir gains Crimson Rush the next time it becomes available to cast. Crimson Rush: Vladimir is briefly hasted and for the next 2.5 seconds Transfusion deals 85% increased damage and heals for an additional [0] plus 5% (+ [0]%) of his missing health (empowered heal has 35% effectiveness against minions).

W.name: Sanguine Pool
W.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining a brief haste and becoming untargetable while slowing enemies above him by 40%. Vladimir deals 80/135/190/245/300 (+0.15*Bonus AD) [10% of bonus Health] magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 15% of that amount. Sanguine Pool can be cast while charging Tides of Blood.

E.name: Tides of Blood
E.description: First Cast: Vladimir charges up a reservoir of blood, spending up to 8% of his max Health ( [0]) to increase this spell's damage. While at full charge, Vladimir is slowed. Second Cast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of blood at surrounding enemies which deals between 30/45/60/75/90 (+ [0]) (+0.35*Bonus AP) and (+ [0]) (+0.8*Bonus AP) magic damage and, at full charge, briefly slows by 40/45/50/55/60%. Targets hit block a portion of the nova. Tides of Blood will release automatically if held for more than 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Hemoplague
R.description: Vladimir infects enemies in a target area with a virulent plague, causing them to take 10% increased damage from all sources for 4 seconds. After 4 seconds, Vladimir deals 150/250/350 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to all infected targets. If Hemoplague damages an enemy Champion, Vladimir heals himself for [0] (+ [0]) , plus 50% for each Champion beyond the first.

P.name: Chosen of the Storm
P.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

Q.name: Rolling Thunder
Q.description: Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. This bonus is enhanced to 30/37.5/45/52.5/60% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions. Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional 30/60/90/120/150 physical damage and flings the target behind him.

W.name: Frenzy
W.description: Passive: Volibear gains 4/8/12/16/20% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to 3 times. Active: When Volibear has 3 stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.15*Bonus AD [15% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by 1% for each 1% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a minion or monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by 50%.

E.name: Majestic Roar
E.description: Volibear deals 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back slightly and slowing them by 30/35/40/45/50% for 3 seconds. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt an additional 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage. Additionally, minions and monsters are feared for 3 seconds.

R.name: Thunder Claws
R.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to 8 nearby enemies with 75/115/155 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage. For the next 12 seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal 75/115/155 (+0.3*Bonus AP) bonus magic damage that chains to 8 nearby enemies.

P.name: Eternal Hunger
P.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

Q.name: Jaws of the Beast
Q.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them. On release, deals 1.2*Bonus AD +0.9*Bonus AP plus 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% of your target's maximum health as magic damage (applies On Hit effects). Heal 30/40/50/60/70% of damage dealt. While attached , Warwick follows any movements they make and cannot be displaced.

W.name: Blood Hunt
W.description: Passive: Warwick gains 50/65/80/95/110% attack speed against enemies below 50% health. He also senses low health champions globally, moving 35/40/45/50/55% faster toward them when out of combat. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% health. Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion. While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.

E.name: Primal Howl
E.description: Warwick gains 35/40/45/50/55% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end of the duration, or if activated again, Warwick howls, causing all nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

R.name: Infinite Duress
R.description: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds. Deals 175/350/525 (+1.67*Bonus AD) magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.

P.name: Clean Cuts
P.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

Q.name: Double Daggers
Q.description: Xayah throws two knives dealing [0] (+ [0]) physical damage and leaving two Feathers . Targets hit after the first take 50% damage.

W.name: Deadly Plumage
W.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grant her 30/35/40/45/50% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for 20% damage. If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, allies under the effects of Deadly Plumage gain 30% movement speed for 1.5 seconds. If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

E.name: Bladecaller
E.description: Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing 55/65/75/85/95 (+ [0]) (+ [0]) physical damage to enemies they pass through (Increased by Critical Strike Chance ). Hitting an enemy with 3 Feathers roots them for 1 second. Minions take 50% damage from Bladecaller.

R.name: Featherstorm
R.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal 100/150/200 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers . Xayah can move while in the air.

P.name: Mana Surge
P.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

Q.name: Arcanopulse
Q.description: First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range. Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies in a line. While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.

W.name: Eye of Destruction
W.description: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take [0] (+ [0]) magic damage and are slowed by 60/65/70/75/80%. This slow decays rapidly.

E.name: Shocking Orb
E.description: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.45*Bonus AP) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.5 and 2 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

R.name: Rite of the Arcane
R.description: Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining 3/4/5 Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals 200/240/280 (+0.43*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies hit. The root ends after 10 seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, 50% of the cooldown is refunded.

P.name: Determination
P.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

Q.name: Three Talon Strike
Q.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal 20/25/30/35/40 (+ [0]) extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for 0.75 seconds.

W.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
W.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward. Slash : 30/40/50/60/70 (+0.3*Bonus AD) damage. Thrust : 30/65/100/135/170 (+0.75*Bonus AD) damage and slows by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Cast time is reduced with Attack Speed provided from items and levels (minimum of 0.4 seconds). Current cast time: [0] Deals 50% less damage to minions. Lifesteal is 33% effective on both attacks. Extends the current duration of Xin Zhao's other abilities by [0] seconds.

E.name: Audacious Charge
E.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals 50/75/100/125/150 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds. Charging grants Xin Zhao 40/45/50/55/60% attack speed for 5 seconds.

R.name: Crescent Guard
R.description: Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals 75/175/275 (+1*Bonus AD) plus 15% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks them back (max 600 vs monsters). For 3 seconds after casting this ability, Xin Zhao has increased Awareness and will completely block damage from enemies that are far away. Xin Zhao's attacks and spell casts increase the duration of Awareness by 0.3 seconds each. The last champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is not knocked back.

P.name: Way of the Wanderer
P.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

Q.name: Steel Tempest
Q.description: Thrusts forward, dealing 20/45/70/95/120 (+1*Bonus AD) physical damage. On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne . Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed. If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

W.name: Wind Wall
W.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

E.name: Sweeping Blade
E.description: Dashes through target enemy, dealing 60/70/80/90/100 (+0.6*Bonus AP) (+0.2*Bonus AD) magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by 25%, up to +50%. Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for 10/9/8/7/6 seconds. If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

R.name: Last Breath
R.description: Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing 200/300/400 (+1.5*Bonus AD) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second(s). Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm. For 15 second(s), Yasuo's critical strikes gain 50% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, and runes.

P.name: Shepherd of Souls
P.description: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.

Q.name: Last Rites
Q.description: Yorick's next basic attack deals 30/55/80/105/130 (+1.4*Bonus AD) physical damage and restores [0] Health (doubled when below half Health). Last Rites will leave a grave if it kills the target. When there are three or more graves nearby and Last Rites has been used, Yorick can cast Awakening to raise Mist Walkers from graves.

W.name: Dark Procession
W.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with 2/2/3/3/4 Health around target area for 4 seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.

E.name: Mourning Mist
E.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals 15% of enemy's current Health as magic damage (minimum 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.7*Bonus AP) ), slows by 30% for 2 seconds, and marks champions and monsters for 4 seconds. Yorick and his minions are hasted by 20% while moving toward the mark.

R.name: Eulogy of the Isles
R.description: Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and 2/3/4 Mist Walkers. The Maiden has 700/1500/4000 (+ [0]) Health, deals 10/20/40 (+ [0]) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths. When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal 5/7.5/10% of their max Health as bonus magic damage (2 second cooldown). If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.

P.name: Cell Division
P.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

Q.name: Stretching Strikes
Q.description: Zac's arm stretches and grabs the first enemy it hits, dealing 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.3*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage and briefly slowing them. Zac's next basic attack is replaced with a long range smack that repeats the initial magic damage and slow effect. If Zac grabs a different enemy with each attack he'll throw them towards each other, dealing 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.3*Bonus AP) (+ [0]) magic damage in an area if they collide.

W.name: Unstable Matter
W.description: Zac's body erupts, dealing 15/30/45/60/75 magic damage +4/5/6/7/8% of the enemy's max health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Absorbing Goo reduces Unstable Matter's cooldown by 1 second. Max health damage is capped at 200 versus minions and monsters.

E.name: Elastic Slingshot
E.description: First cast: Zac faces the cursor and charges up over 0.9/1/1.1/1.2/1.3 seconds. Second cast: Launches Zac towards a location, knocking up nearby enemies for [0] to [0] seconds (based on charge time) and dealing 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage. Zac spawns extra chunks of Goo for each enemy champion hit. Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

R.name: Let's Bounce!
R.description: First cast: Zac squishes himself down, making him immune to Crowd Control for up to 2.5 seconds. Enemies standing on top of him are slowed by 30/40/50%. Second cast: Charging for at least [0] seconds before recasting causes Zac to scoop up enemies on top of him, carrying them towards a location. Upon landing nearby enemies take 150/250/350 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage and are briefly slowed. Reactivating before Zac charges up knocks back nearby enemies instead.

P.name: Contempt for the Weak
P.description: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

Q.name: Razor Shuriken
Q.description: Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.9*Bonus AD) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and 48/69/90/110/132 (+0.54*Bonus AD) physical damage to each additional enemy.

W.name: Living Shadow
W.description: Passive: Zed gains 30/35/40/45/50 energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability. Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

E.name: Shadow Slash
E.description: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing 70/95/120/145/170 (+0.8*Bonus AD) physical damage to nearby enemies. Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by 30/37.5/45/52.5/60% instead.

R.name: Death Mark
R.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds, the mark triggers, dealing physical damage equal to 1*Bonus AD + 25/40/55% of all damage dealt to the target by Zed while the mark was active. The dash leaves a shadow behind for 6 seconds. Reactivating Death Mark causes Zed to switch positions with this shadow. Reaper of Shadows: Zed reaps the shadow of the strongest foe slain under Death Mark, gaining [0] attack damage. ( + 5/10/15% of the victim's attack damage.)

P.name: Short Fuse
P.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

Q.name: Bouncing Bomb
Q.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.65*Bonus AP) magic damage.

W.name: Satchel Charge
W.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.35*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below [0]% of their Health.

E.name: Hexplosive Minefield
E.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.3*Bonus AP) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after 10 seconds.

R.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
R.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take 300/450/600 (+1.1*Bonus AP) magic damage. Enemies farther away take 200/300/400 (+0.7333*Bonus AP) magic damage.

P.name: Time in a Bottle
P.description: Zilean stores time as Experience .  When he has enough Experience  to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience  as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

Q.name: Time Bomb
Q.description: Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After 3 seconds it detonates, dealing 75/115/165/230/300 (+0.9*Bonus AP) magic damage to all surrounding enemies. Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.

W.name: Rewind
W.description: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by 10 seconds.

E.name: Time Warp
E.description: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by 40/55/70/85/99% for 2.5 seconds.

R.name: Chronoshift
R.description: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for 5 seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, arriving with 600/850/1100 (+2*Bonus AP) Health.

P.name: More Sparkles!
P.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

Q.name: Paddle Star!
Q.description: Fire a missile that deals increasing damage the further it travels -- [0] (+0.6*Bonus AP) to [0] (+1.5*Bonus AP) magic damage. Enemies near the first target hit take 80% damage. Recast to redirect the missile to a new position near Zoe. Paddle Star! deals damage based on a combination of Paddle Star's rank and Zoe's level.

W.name: Spell Thief
W.description: Enemy Summoner Spell and Active Item casts drop spell shards lasting 40 seconds. Some minions also drop a spell shard when Zoe kills them. Active: Collecting a spell shard grants one cast of that spell. ____________________________________________ Passive: When Zoe casts a Summoner Spell or Spell Thief, she gains 30/40/50/60/70% movement speed for seconds and tosses up to 3 missiles at her attack target, dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage total. Each missile can apply More Sparkles! Movement speed bonus and missile damage improve with spell rank.

E.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
E.description: Dropkick a bubble that deals 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) magic damage, lingering as a trap if it hits nothing. The bubble's range is extended when flying over a wall. After a delay, the victim falls asleep for 2 seconds. Attacks and spell hits break sleep but deal double damage, up to 60/100/140/180/220 (+0.4*Bonus AP) bonus true damage.

R.name: Portal Jump
R.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back. Zoe may cast and attack, but not move, during this time. She can also see over walls.

P.name: Garden of Thorns
P.description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies.  Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

Q.name: Deadly Spines
Q.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.6*Bonus AP) magic damage to enemies within the area. Garden of Thorns: If Deadly Spines is cast near a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing [0] (+0.15*Bonus AP) magic damage. A Thorn Spitter has 575 range and lasts [0] seconds.

W.name: Rampant Growth
W.description: Plants a seed, lasting 60 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Seeds spawned by Rampant Growth grant vision in a small area, and if stepped on they grant True Sight of the enemy champion for 2 seconds. Zyra stores a seed every [0] seconds (Max: 8 seeds planted). Each time she kills an enemy, Rampant Growth's recharge time is reduced by 20% (100% for champion takedowns, large minion kills, and large monster kills).

E.name: Grasping Roots
E.description: Sends forward vines dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5*Bonus AP) magic damage and rooting enemies for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s). Garden of Thorns: If Grasping Roots passes near a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing [0] (+0.15*Bonus AP) magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts [0] seconds.

R.name: Stranglethorns
R.description: Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals 180/265/350 (+0.7*Bonus AP) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for 1 second. Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, resetting their duration, gaining 50% Health and attacking in a flurry for 200% total damage.
